Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: This is a very dangerous place. Let’s get you out of here.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Who are you?! Damn, how many of these bandits are there! And more trucks keep arriving!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: We have no time for talk! Are you comming?

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04b
Reply.text: Yes! Alone I will perish here…

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04a
Reply.text: I’m not leaving this place! They are murderers! We have to fight!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N05a
Reply.text: You stand no chance against them, not by yourself, not with our help. Come with us if you want to live.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N06a
Reply.text: Arghhh! I’ll be back!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N01
Reply.text: You were this close to getting youself killed. My people got here just in time.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N02
Reply.text: Who are you and why did you help me?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N03
Reply.text: We help all people in need. Everyone who comes here is worthy of a royal treatment.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N04
Reply.text: You haven’t answered my question!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N05
Reply.text: The bravest and the smartest people from all over the world come here lured by the Call. Most of them just to find their end here! I meet each and every one of them and try to talk them out of proceeding further.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N06
Reply.text: It is my way to follow in the footsteps of Ivan Go. I have been through too much to stop one step short of my goal.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N07
Reply.text: I remember everyone I meet. I know the man you are talking about. He can't be saved, he’s gone too far.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N08
Reply.text: So Ivan is still alive?!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N09
Reply.text: What happened to him is worse than death. But it’s just as irreversible.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N10
Reply.text: No more riddles! Tell me where he is.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N11
Reply.text: I see… Until you see it with your own eyes, you won't understand, and then it will be too late... Go on down the road. We'll talk when you're back.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N01
Reply.text: Your willpower is impressive! You were able to resist the voice of heaven!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N02
Reply.text: I haven't heard anything of the sort.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N03
Reply.text: Then we made the right choice. A rare person can get close to the source and find the strength to return. We've been waiting for you for many years.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N04
Reply.text: Cut to the chase.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N05
Reply.text: You are destined to stop the madness that seized all those people.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N06
Reply.text: I'm willing to try to save these people. But tell me first, what happened here?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N07
Reply.text: A long time ago, our world was whole. Huge states, cities of millions of people, machines that would think for you! Everything was simple and clear. But one day it all came crashing down…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N08
Reply.text: Thinking machines? This kind of thing does no good… So what happened?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N09
Reply.text: Space Defense forces spotted an unidentified flying object, which was immediately shot down. You saw it on your way. My colleagues and I were sent to study this amazing phenomenon. The situation at the time was very intense: this country was in the midst of the stuggle against terrorism. So we worked in a hurry, with the intelligence services of the major powers and local guerrillas all breathing down our necks.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N10
Reply.text: I don't understand much of what you're saying… But it seems that the old world was no more kind than the present one.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N11
Reply.text: Perhaps… I never thought of this… When we managed to get on board the ship, and it was a ship, no doubt – we were ecstatic. We thought of the endless opportunities: new medicines, ultra-durable materials, revolutionary technologies… But we found only death: the workers died under the wheels of machinery, three of my colleagues committed suicide within two days of this research. But the worst thing happened when we opened the sealed cell in the central section…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N12
Reply.text: You shouldn’t have done that. How could you ignore all those clear warning signals?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N13
Reply.text: But we are scientists! We don’t believe in superstition. I'll continue: apparently, the automatic system that had been hibernating up to that point kicked in. Something inconceivable began to happen... My colleagues... their bodies literally exploded... and I heard this Voice inside my head… I blacked out and when I woke up, I was outside the ship, in this camp. I called for help, but nobody came. The radio was silent. I realized that there had been a catastrophe.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N14
Reply.text: So you and those like you destroyed the world to satisfy your curiosity?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N15
Reply.text: Yes. And this knowledge is killing me from the inside. I ought to be punished, but I feel no pain. I can't even die! God knows how many times I tried to end my life... It was horrible. I thought I was the only survivor, but more people started to arrive. My joy was quickly replaced by terror. People had changed. Just look at me or yourself. I dread to even imagine what’s under your mask...

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N16
Reply.text: What are you talking about? We are wearing masks because the air is contaminated!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N17
Reply.text: Whatever. Let it be the contaminated air. What matters now is that the device is still working and contamination is entering the atmosphere.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N18
Reply.text: So, if we turn it off, the air will be cleared are people will become human again? So why didn’t you go back and turn it off yourself?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N19
Reply.text: I can neither come close to the device, nor leave this place! I am doomed to stay around that damn machine forever and watch. All I can do is to ask those who arrive to destroy this monstrous thing. But no one has succeeded so far...

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20b
Reply.text: You’ve done the humanity so much harm. I will destroy this place and you along with it.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21b
Reply.text: That’s all I ask. We took some samples to the northwest military complex. They’ve probably got the results now and will tell you how to destroy the Source. Even if the people there are dead, the AI of the complex should still be functioning.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22b
Reply.text: I’ve been there and I'm familiar with this mechanical creature. It calls itself the Oracle.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23b
Reply.text: Good luck to you. I hope you succeed where other have failed.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24b
Reply.text: Goodbye. I don’t think we’ll see each other again.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20a
Reply.text: I’ve got to find a way to save all those people. There must be a way to turn the machine off without getting too close.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21a
Reply.text: Ivan Go, when he was here, said something about strange lights in the sky. And he wasn’t all that surprised when he saw the space ship. Perhaps he had seen seen something like that before.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22a
Reply.text: I know his friend Ben Throttle, he must know something about it. I have to talk to him.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23a
Reply.text: Off you go. And may luck be with you!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24a
Reply.text: I think I'm going to need it.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N01
Reply.text: There’s nothing else I can do for you. Go and do what you have to do.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N02
Reply.text: It won’t be easy, but I’ll make it.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N01
Reply.text: You resisted the Great Call, foreigner, so I want to give you one thing.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N02
Reply.text: What call are you talking about? What is this thing?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N03
Reply.text: Hush, hurry, they're watching. This is the last copy of the book that tells you what happened to our world...

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N04
Reply.text: Stop, you madman! Where are you rushing off to...

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N01
Reply.text: Today is the race day! Anyone can take part!

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02b
Reply.text: Not interested.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02a
Reply.text: I would like to be a contestant.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N03a
Reply.text: You’ve got to pay the participant’s fee of 5,000 coins plus 5,000 as the race car insurance cost.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000158
Reply.text: I have insurance, so I’m not giving you that car.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000164
Reply.text: Fair enough.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N04aa
Reply.text: What race car? What are you talking about?

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N05aa
Reply.text: We lend you an expensive race car and if you wreck it, we'll reimburse you from the deposit.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aac
Reply.text: I don’t have that kind of money.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aab
Reply.text: Nah, I’m out of here.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aaa
Reply.text: It’s a deal. What are the rules?

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N07aaa
Reply.text: The rules are simple: false start - you lose, crush the car - you lose. 1st prize is 40,000, 2nd – 20,000, 3rd – 10,000. The repair works will be deducted from the insurance deposit, so don't be surprised if you don't get all your money back.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N08aaa
Reply.text: I see. Let's GO!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000153
Reply.text: You can try your luck and your driving skill and win the main prize!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000154
Reply.text: What do I need to do?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000155
Reply.text: Go through the maze full of traps. It’s dangerous, but the adrenaline is worth it!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000160
Reply.text: It’s not my idea of fun.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000159
Reply.text: I’d like to have a go at it!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000161
Reply.text: Good. The participant’s fee is 1,000. If you get to the end, the prize is yours. If not, then, sorry man!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000167
Reply.text: I don’t have money.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000168
Reply.text: Have you come here to get insurance?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000169
Reply.text: What sort of insurance do you give?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000170
Reply.text: We can insure your car against damage in the race. If you crush it, we’ll compensate the repair costs.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000173
Reply.text: I don’t need it.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000171
Reply.text: How much does the insurance cost?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000172
Reply.text: It costs 1,000. If the car gets damaged, we’ll return you half the sum, but if you crush it, we’re keeping the whole sum.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000174
Reply.text: Is that all?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000175
Reply.text: There’s one more thing. In case of your victory, we’ll get 25% of the prize.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000178
Reply.text: I don’t have money.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000177
Reply.text: I’m not buying it.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000176
Reply.text: Your conditions don’t sound too bad. I’d like to insure my bolide.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000187
Reply.text: Welcome to the world of grownup men entertainment!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000188
Reply.text: What’s so special about your entertainment?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000189
Reply.text: We help to unleash your true nature and feel utter pleasure!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000190
Reply.text: How’s that?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000191
Reply.text: You’ll get a chance to kill your match, not just a bunch of stupid bandits.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000194
Reply.text: I don’t want to risk my butt.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000192
Reply.text: Sounds interesting. I’d like to try.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000193
Reply.text: Good. So, here are the rules...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000000
Reply.text: Look! It’s them!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000002
Reply.text: The people who massacred your village.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000003
Reply.text: Are you sure? I can get my revenge right here!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000004
Reply.text: Absolutely. That’s the truck I saw in the village.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000006
Reply.text: It’s time for revenge then. Blood for blood.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000005
Reply.text: I think they are just mercenaries. Let’s follow them and find the true murderers.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000007
Reply.text: Why do you want to kill us, stranger?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000008
Reply.text: You’ve attacked my village and killed all of our people several months ago.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000009
Reply.text: What are you talking about, man? We wouldn’t go further than it takes to defend our towns.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N01
Reply.text: It’s been ages since we saw a new face in our lands. Make yourself at home, stranger!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P02
Reply.text: I’m looking for a man...

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N03
Reply.text: Stop looking. You’ve come to the best place in the world. The gardens and the fountains of our town are sung by the greatest poets! What more could a man want?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P04
Reply.text: I see neither gardens, nor fountains here.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N05
Reply.text: Every day the evil demons of the desert raid our houses and destroy everything in their path. Almost every single day we have to repel their attacks – that’s why our monuments are neglected. Without due care they crumble. What a pity...

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P06
Reply.text: Still, can you tell me where can I find out about events that happened a long time ago? Someone important to me passed by these places many years ago.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N07
Reply.text: We don’t keep track of the travelers; we’ve got other things to worry about. Our elders might be of help, though. But they’ve left the town.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P08
Reply.text: Where have they gone?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N09
Reply.text: Of this I do not know. Ask our neighbors. Maybe they are not so exhausted by the attacks and can help you. Not far from here is Kef. Look there.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P10
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll try my luck elsewhere... [I have some uneasy thoughts about this place. Everyone here seems strange.]

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Good night, traveler. What brought you so far?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N02
Reply.text: Greetings! A man called Ivan passed through your land many years ago. He never returned home, and now we are searching everywhere for him. Is there anyone in your town who remembers times past?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: There's nothing for you to learn here. Our elders, the keepers of knowledge, gathered one day and simply left for an unknown destination. We have been trying to find them, but so far we have been unsuccessful.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N04
Reply.text: But why did they left you?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Because of the war, I guess. The incessant attacks have exausted us, made us forget about beauty and reverence for our elders. All we are thinking about is survival. But is it worth living when beauty is gone? You've wounded my soul, outlander!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N06
Reply.text: You folks are weird... I swear, you guys are very weird.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: Actually, one of our rescue parties is going to come back soon. Wait a little while. They may have news of the elders. In the meantime, can you help us in our trouble?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N08
Reply.text: What exactly is needed?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Oil is our blood. Without it, the machines will stop working and we will be defenseless in the face of attackers!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N10
Reply.text: Makes sense. So what happened to your oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N11
Reply.text: The source of the precious liquid has dried up! Until recently, we were supplied by the people of Khazif. But no one dares to go there anymore: it has become too dangerous to leave the city walls.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N12
Reply.text: Do you want me to bring you a cistern of oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13
Reply.text: Yes. We’ll give you a tanker truck and take care of your truck while you are away.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13b
Reply.text: Sounds too dangerous. I don't want to be a part of it.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13a
Reply.text: All right, but make sure you don’t touch anything in my truck!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: Did you bring us what you promised?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02b
Reply.text: No, something urgent came up. But I’ll bring it to you soon.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02
Reply.text: Here’s your oil.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: What a nuisance! We can't do anything with the oil. Our only specialist in distillation has gone missing. And the equipment won't work on crude oil.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N04
Reply.text: What happened to him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N05
Reply.text: He ran away as if we were some kind of beasts here! Bring him back. He won't listen to us, but maybe he'll talk to you.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N06
Reply.text: Where should I look for him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N07
Reply.text: There is not much of a place to hide here. The villages are all burnt down. He probably went to Alikham, there's nowhere else to go.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N08
Reply.text: I’ll bring him back. I hope that by the time I get back, you'll know exactly where to look for the elders. I really need to talk to them.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N01
Reply.text: You dared to do that!?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N03
Reply.text: The oil! Will you bring us the oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04b
Reply.text: No way. I’ve got more important things to do.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04a
Reply.text: All right, I’ll do it.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: What are you looking for?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Have you noticed if a mechanic from the nearby town has passed through?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: Yes, I saw him. He was all disheveled and acted really strange.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N04
Reply.text: Where did he go next?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N05
Reply.text: He went further down the road.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N01
Reply.text: I beg you, don’t touch me!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N02
Reply.text: Why should I hurt you?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N03
Reply.text: How should I know why people torture and kill each other! Leave me alone!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N04
Reply.text: What's the matter with you?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N05
Reply.text: I know nothing and I won't say anything to you!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N06
Reply.text: The old chap seems to have lost his mind. I guess I’ll have to take him to Kef anyway. I don’t think he’ll be of much help to its people, though.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07
Reply.text: You won’t dare. Let me go! I want to know, if there are still people who are alive in this world. If not, there's no point in me fighting. But I won't go back to them! No way!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07b
Reply.text: Tell me, what happened to you?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08b
Reply.text: I have been exposed to a terrible truth. And I'm not sure I can live with this knowledge. No, I can't bear it! Everything is a lie!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09b
Reply.text: Listen, your car might be able to cross the desert. Go northwest the whole time, and you'll find towns full of life and happy people there. Maybe there, among green meadows, you will find peace of mind.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N10b
Reply.text: Are you saying there are other survivors? And you’re letting me go? Thank you, perhaps I can be saved!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N11b
Reply.text: What am I going to say in Kef?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07a
Reply.text: I’ll have to use force then.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08a
Reply.text: I’d rather die!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09a
Reply.text: Bloody hell. What scared the poor guy so much? And what am I going to say in Kef?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: We don’t see the mechanic with you. You didn’t find him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: Unfortunately, I couldn't get the mechanic to come back. He was so terrified of something that he killed himself.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: I'm heartbroken to hear that... But I trust you did the best you could.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: So you're still going to tell me where to look for those, who remember?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N05
Reply.text: Yes, we found their village. The elders are hiding from everyone on the coast. We’ll send another rescue party after them as soon as we recover from the last attack. It is unfit for honorable men to huddle in huts!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N06
Reply.text: Thank you, I will pass on your kind words.

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_1_N01
Reply.text: They found us! Run for your lives!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000072
Reply.text: Wait! I come in peace.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000073
Reply.text: This one looks quite normal…| How did you find us?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000074
Reply.text: A kind man from the town showed me the way. He said a rescue party will soon arrive for you.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000075
Reply.text: The moment I dreaded has come. Brothers, we can hide no longer. We will fight. And we will die if we have to!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000076
Reply.text: What are you talking about? They only want...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000077
Reply.text: Don’t you get it? I think we have some time left. Come in and hear our story.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000080
Reply.text: There’s no time for stories. We are under attack!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000078
Reply.text: Explain to me at last what's going on here!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000079
Reply.text: Many moons ago our land was a blooming garden. We recovered from the Catastrophe and we thought we could start our life afresh. But we began to notice that people behaved strangely at times. Sometimes their eyes glowed with insane joy, and sometimes they sparkled with furious anger.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000081
Reply.text: I think I'm starting to understand.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000082
Reply.text: At first everyone restrained their emotions, but one day it all came crumbling down. One good man attacked his family and had no recollection of it. He was executed, but ever since that day fear took a strong grip of our hearts. It was no longer possible to trust the people we were closest with. It was impossible to trust ourselves.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000083
Reply.text: So there are no elusive bandits, demons of the desert?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000084
Reply.text: I’m afraid not. Over time, people with aligning cycles of madness united to hunt other groups. Only few survived. After many long agonizing years, only a few have survived. They build towns and destroy them the next day.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000085
Reply.text: But how could you avoid the madness?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000086
Reply.text: We were very old even back then, at the time of the Catastrophe. Strong emotions are the domain of the young. It was our lot to keep the memories and mourn the dead. When we realized what had happened, we left the big cities and tried to hide from the sight of the mad. But this couldn’t last forever. Now we are discovered and will be killed very soon. I can already feel the enemies approaching...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000087
Reply.text: I won’t let you die until you tell me everything you know about Ivan!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000088
Reply.text: Too late. They are attacking.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000089
Reply.text: I’ll fight on your side!

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_2_N01
Reply.text: We won this battle, but they will come back. It’s just a matter of time. We have no more strength left to fight.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000091
Reply.text: What are we going to do? I can’t just leave you here! How can I get you out of here?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000092
Reply.text: There is a port nearby, but there aren’t any ships left. Although the machinery is working, we checked.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000093
Reply.text: Excellent, I have a device that I can use to summon a ship. You’ll be evacuated to the lands where people are normal. At least more normal than here.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000094
Reply.text: What a stroke of luck! I can hardly believe it's possible.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Show me where the port is, and I'll escort you and call the ship.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N01
Reply.text: Stay where you are, infidel! Why have you come to the sacred land of the Oracle?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N02
Reply.text: I’ve come to the Oracle to get an answer to my question.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N03
Reply.text: No one can see Him but the true believers!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N042
Reply.text: I desire with all my heart to become a believer. Accept me into your ranks.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N052
Reply.text: Your wish is commendable, foreigner. You will have to make a sacrifice to renounce your past delusions! Are you ready?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N062
Reply.text: My decision is certain. What sacrifice does your faith require?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N072
Reply.text: He who thirsts for the blood of the others is not worthy to face the Oracle! Give us all your weapons and cleanse yourself!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N082
Reply.text: But then I will be left defenseless against the dangers of the road!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N092
Reply.text: The almighty Oracle will protect you in your journey.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1022
Reply.text: You are asking too much. Is there any other way to see the Oracle?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1122
Reply.text: There is always another way, but it’s hard and full of dangers.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1222
Reply.text: I'm used to taking risks. Tell me, what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1322
Reply.text: Bring us the head of the steel monster that is guarding the entrance to the town of the living dead.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1422
Reply.text: Sounds impressive, even though I don’t believe fairy-tales. How do I defeat the guard?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1522
Reply.text: Try luring him to a one-on-one combat. That’s your only chance to defeat it. And even then it’s only a slim chance.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000201
Reply.text: I’d rather get rid of you!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16222
Reply.text: It’s a hard choice, but I guess I’ll sacrifice my weapon.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000202
Reply.text: Wise decision. The gracious Oracle will share his wisdom with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000203
Reply.text: I hope his advice is worth all that trouble.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16221
Reply.text: I’ll bring you the head of the monster!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1021
Reply.text: All right. You can take the weapon.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1121
Reply.text: I greet you, brother found. Come to the Oracle and embrace his wisdom!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000204
Reply.text: I hope I did the right thing.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N041
Reply.text: Who are you to stand between me and my goal?! Get out of my way! I don't have time to talk to you!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N051
Reply.text: He’s threatening us, brothers! Attack the infidel!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000195
Reply.text: There seems to be no peaceful solution here.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N01
Reply.text: Were you able to defeat the monster?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N022
Reply.text: Here’s his head. I’ve done my part of the deal.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N032
Reply.text: I greet you, brother found. Come to the Oracle and embrace his wisdom!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N042
Reply.text: That’s exactly why I came here.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N021
Reply.text: I couldn’t defeat it yet.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N01
Reply.text: How dare you trouble me, mortal? Gods speak through me and and I care not for your petty affairs!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P02
Reply.text: Answer my question and sleep in peace.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N03
Reply.text: You are not like those who usually bring me tributes... My prophecies are a valuable gift, and I will ask a lot in return. Are you ready for this?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P04
Reply.text: I’ve crossed the world to get here and I’m not turning back now. Tell me what you need.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N05
Reply.text: For the prophecy, I will need two artifacts from the fortress of the steel monsters, or, as fools call it, from the city of the dead. I would usually only ask to bring one, but you've got a truck, and I can see the marks of many battles on your face.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P06
Reply.text: What sort of artifacts?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N07
Reply.text: You’ll know it when you see it. And if not, you are not worthy of my help. Off you go!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P08
Reply.text: I’ll be back soon.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N01
Reply.text: I see you've been busy, wanderer.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P02
Reply.text: Yes, I’ve brought what you asked.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N03
Reply.text: With these details, the work will finally move forward. Consider yourself blessed by the gods: I will now hear your question.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P042
Reply.text: My father was killed. I want to find the murderers and punish them!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N052
Reply.text: Problems of mortals do not concern me, but in return for your efforts, I'll help you. I need information for analysis. Tell me everything you know.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P062
Reply.text: My home was attacked by people from the east, from the other side of the Death Desert. I’ve got to find them, but no one knows how to survive in that eerie place.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N072
Reply.text: A creature of flesh will not survive there long. But what’s the obect in your hands?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P082
Reply.text: It’s a disc that belonged to my father. Some say you can read it. Maybe its contents will help me find the murderers and understand their motives.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P041
Reply.text: My father’s name is Ivan Go, he was an Explorer. Many years ago he disappeared without a trace and left me to be raised by a friend of his. A little while ago some goons attacked our village and burned it down. No one survived...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N051
Reply.text: I didn’t hear the question. Do you want to know who attacked your village? Do you seek revenge?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P061
Reply.text: Yes. I mean, no. I think my father is still alive and I want to find him. But I am sure that the attack on my village is somehow connected to his disappearance.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N071
Reply.text: I see. The whereabouts of Ivan Go are unknown to me. Pity you came all this way for nothing, pilgrim. Farewell.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P081
Reply.text: Wait, I didn't come here empty-handed. Here’s a disc that belonged to my father. Some say you can read it. Perhaps it contains some clues.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N01
Reply.text: I haven’t seen anything like this in a long time. And certainly no one had ever come to me with such anybody coming to me with such a request. Although in the very beginning...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N02
Reply.text: That’s my only hope.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N03
Reply.text: The artifacts you’ve brought will help... It might work out. But you’ve got to help me to remember.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N04
Reply.text: Just tell me what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N05
Reply.text: Concentrate the energy of the spheres, so that the celestial light might shine on the darkness of...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N06
Reply.text: Save your riddles for the ignorant heathen, just tell me what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N07
Reply.text: Take three of my little helpers to the three menhirs. Here, here and here. They will configure my remote memory modules. But make sure the savages who worship me don’t interfere.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N08
Reply.text: I’m leaving immediately. I’ve got hope now!
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m2_OracleMemory'); TActivate('trVK1'); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot1' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot2' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot3' ); GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity(0); EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N01
Reply.text: My functionality increased significantly with the new modules connected. I haven’t completed a full check of all systems yet. It’ll take a while.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N02
Reply.text: But is there just about anything that you can tell me for sure after all these tasks?!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N031
Reply.text: The disc indeed belonged to Ivan Go. It’s a diary that contains a lot of information about our world.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N041
Reply.text: Come on, read the final entries!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N051
Reply.text: Reading the table of contents... The final entry: [Preparations for the expedition].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N061
Reply.text: Yes, that’s it! Read on!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N071
Reply.text: However, the information is protected by a complex cipher. Unless you’ve got a key, the decryption may take a few years, which is unacceptable for you, as I can see.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N081
Reply.text: I don't understand, what kind of key?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N091
Reply.text: Judging by the nature of encryption, with a 96,7% probability it’s another disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N101
Reply.text: You must be kidding! I’ve come here to get an answer to my question, and you send me to look for another stupid piece of plastic?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N111
Reply.text: Seek and you will find. Perhaps the key is hidden among Ivan's possessions.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N121
Reply.text: It might be worth another visit to my father's house.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N032
Reply.text: Judging by the contents, I can state with 100% confidence that the disc contains the schematics of the device that allows people to cross the radioactive desert among other things.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N042
Reply.text: That's great! Go on, what else did you find out?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N052
Reply.text: The disc also contains a lot of information about a man called Ivan Go.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N062
Reply.text: Turns out, we were right and my deceased father was closely connected with that man.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N072
Reply.text: However, the information is protected by a complex cipher. Unless you’ve got a key, the decryption may take a few years, which is unacceptable for you, as I can see.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N082
Reply.text: I don't understand, what kind of key?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N092
Reply.text: Judging by the nature of encryption, with a 96,7% probability it’s another disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N102
Reply.text: And where am I supposed to look for it?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N112
Reply.text: Ask the one who came with you! She has the answers. Farewell.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N122
Reply.text: Wait up! I haven’t finished with you! He’s gone... Looks like I’ll have to ask Lisa a few questions.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N01
Reply.text: You’ve returned with the key.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N02
Reply.text: Yes, here’s the second disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N03
Reply.text: Give it to me and wait for the answer.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N04
Reply.text: What else is there for me to do? I'll wait.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05b
Reply.text: I was able to read the contents of the disk. You were right: it’s your father’s diary. I need some time to analyze the whole volume of the data, but I can answer the main questions now.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06b
Reply.text: Tell me where to find him!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05a
Reply.text: I was able to read the contents of the disk. You were right: it’s Ivan Go’s diary, where he describes his journeys and discoveries. I need some time to analyze the whole volume of the data, but I can answer the main questions now.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06a
Reply.text: Has Ivan been to the Death Desert? There should be a clue on the disk as to how to cross the sands!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N07a
Reply.text: The final entry says: ‘I’ve never been so close to my objective before. I've gathered all the information I need, prepared as well as I could, and there's no sense in delaying my trip. There may be people on the other side of the desert, but I don't care about them. They might show me the way, though. If I succeed, the world will change for the better. If not – I’ve got nothing to lose anyway’.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N08a
Reply.text: I was sure we would find what we need here! Read on!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N09a
Reply.text: The disk contains a schematic that you can use to prepare the truck for the harsh desert conditions. I'll make a copy. Show it to a skilled mechanic and he’ll be able to equip you.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N10a
Reply.text: Now all that's left is to find a master. I think Midgard is the right place to look.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N11a
Reply.text: As for the remainder of the information, this data is too dangerous to be trusted into the hands of ignorant people. When the time comes, I will share it with the best of humanity.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000205
Reply.text: You tricked me after all! At least I had time to get the information I needed...

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N01
Reply.text: It’s been a while since anyone came to visit me. What brings you here?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N02
Reply.text: Your friend from Seth asked me to give you this package.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N03
Reply.text: You’ve made my day, young man! These were the times… And now they only fight, shoot each other and spoil my fields.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N04
Reply.text: Yes, times are hard indeed... But what happened to your fields?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N05
Reply.text: Somebody trampled my crops. They drove across it or burnt it – and left strange signs behind.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N06
Reply.text: I think I saw something of the kind before. Show me your where your fields are.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N07
Reply.text: It’s a stone’s throw from here – turn right as you go from here. It was nice talking to you. And thanks for the package!

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N08
Reply.text: You’re welcome. I’ll go have a look at the signs on your fields.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N01
Reply.text: What are you looking for in these forgotten lands?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N02
Reply.text: I’m looking for the Oracle.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N03
Reply.text: You’ve come to the wrong place. The Oracle is in the northwest from here. Now I have to go: I need to bring my fields back to their normal state.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N04
Reply.text: What happened to your fields?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001293
Reply.text: Someone has ruined my crops: either squashed with a truck, or set it on fire - it left strange traces.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001294
Reply.text: I think I’ve seen something similar before. Show me where your crops are, I know people who might be interested in this phenomenon.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001295
Reply.text: It’s a stone’s throw from here – turn right as you go from here. Thank you in advance: for the fields and for the conversation.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001296
Reply.text: Glad to be of help. I'll go look at the signs.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001297
Reply.text: Greetings, traveler.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001298
Reply.text: I need your help. The followers of the Oracle and I have had unresolvable disagreements and now...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001299
Reply.text: I know that the Oracle's disciples don't want to have anything to do with you. For a modest fee of 15% of your monetary possessions, I might perhaps be able to help you gain some semblance of credibility among them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001301
Reply.text: I’d rather not.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001300
Reply.text: Of cource, I agree!

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard2_1_N01
Reply.text: Cease fire! Are we no better than our enemies? I’m sorry, stranger; we mistook you for somebody else.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P02
Reply.text: It's OK, I'm hardly hurt. What sort of place is this? And why are you attacking passersby?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: These are difficult times. Dangers are all around: steel monsters are waking up from their sleep and killing everyone in their way. And they look a lot like your vehicle.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P04
Reply.text: Thanks for the warning. I’ll be careful.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: What brought you to our land?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P06
Reply.text: I came here in search of the Oracle.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: Only the High Druid can help you in your quest. Go to Seth, but be careful – the road is full of steel monsters.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N01
Reply.text: I greet you in our sacred grove, kind traveler.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative') if QuestStatus('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TakeQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid') end CompleteQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P02
Reply.text: Good day to you, High Druid. They told me you know how to get to the Oracle. I really need to talk to him.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N03
Reply.text: An oracle can give a man dangerous knowledge... Prove that you can use it wisely, and I'll tell you which way to follow.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P04
Reply.text: I'm ready for the test.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N05
Reply.text: Our sanctuary has been desecrated. Cleanse it, so that we can carry out our rites in the name of mother earth.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P06
Reply.text: What happened there?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N07
Reply.text: Steel monsters that are hostile to anything living are destroying forests around the holy tree and if nothing is done, it will perish! Make them go away!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P08
Reply.text: I came out of many battles with a victory. I don’t see why this one should be different.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_N01
Reply.text: Is our sanctuary free from the monsters?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_P02
Reply.text: Not yet, but I’m getting there.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N01
Reply.text: I knew that foreigners are not to be trusted.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P02
Reply.text: But I’ve done what you asked!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N03
Reply.text: I don’t know what you’ve done, but it only enraged the enemy. The monsters followed you and are approaching our town now!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P04
Reply.text: The tinkers turned out to be cleverer than I thought. But I’ll keep my word – the enemy will be defeated!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N05
Reply.text: We have learned that it is not enough to kill the enemy. We have to make sure that the new enemy does not take the place of the defeated one.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P06
Reply.text: I see. Do you know where the monsters’ lair is?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N07
Reply.text: Our scouts reported that the monsters are coming from a hole in the ground that appeared in the northeast after a recent earthquake.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P08
Reply.text: Looks like the only way to stop them is to collapse this cave again.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N09
Reply.text: We thought of that too. We’d call to the mother earth to devour the hateful creatures. To be able to do that, we need to get very close to their lair but no one dares...

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P10
Reply.text: Consider me persuaded. What exactly do you want me to do?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N11
Reply.text: Place the praying stone by the hole and quickly leave that place. You may get crushed too if you linger.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P12
Reply.text: I’ll come back with victory. And you’d better be ready to tell me about the Oracle.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N01
Reply.text: The monsters left our land. Thank you!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P02
Reply.text: I think I've done enough to prove my loyalty to the Druid cause.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N03
Reply.text: I'll tell you where the Oracle lives. Look for him in the north, the secret passage begins here.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P04
Reply.text: Now I will find him. Goodbye.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001291
Reply.text: Oh, and one more thing. Before leaving, could you drop in on Brother Finnie? He seems to have some business for you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001292
Reply.text: OK, I will think about it.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Alert! The enemy is attacking from the rear. Fire!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P022
Reply.text: Hold it! I’ve come with peace.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P021
Reply.text: If you want to speak the language of guns, let it be.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: You are riding a steed of steel. Greetings, friend!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindMoreNative'); SetTolerance(1100, 1019, RS_NEUTRAL); if QuestStatus('r3m1_FindMoreNative')==Q_TAKEN then AddHistory( 'r3_Fist_Fight_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); else AddHistory( 'r3_v2_Uluk_FirstTime_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); end

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: I need to meet the Oracle.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: The Oracle’s location is hidden from us. Only wayward druids know it and they use it to their own benefit.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: I guess I’ll have to talk to the druids then.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Wait. They will charge a crazy price! And besides. Unlike us, they are very hostile to outsiders. Help us capture their High Druid and you’ll get all the information you need. Just lure him out of town and we’ll do the rest. Got it? We'll even pay you as a bonus!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P062
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do. But if anything goes wrong – I'll deny we ever knew each other.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P061
Reply.text: This is out of the question! I’m not a traitor!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: You’ve really helped us. The old druid was the final obstacle on our way. Now the machines will enter our life and make it better!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P02
Reply.text: I really need to see the Oracle.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: The druid told us how to get there. The path is open! Thanks for the help and here’s your reward.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P04
Reply.text: I got what I wanted, but I’m not sure I did the right thing.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N01
Reply.text: What happened, wanderer? You look worried.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P022
Reply.text: Master, the people of Uluk are plotting against you. They have sent me to lure you out of the town.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N032
Reply.text: You’ve been wise to reveal the plans of traitors. Come in and be a guest in our sanctuary.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P042
Reply.text: I’d hate to be involved in a betrayal. Besides, you’ve got the information I need.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N052
Reply.text: Have I? What is it that you want to know?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P062
Reply.text: The reason I’ve come here is the Oracle. He’s the only one who can answer my question.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P021
Reply.text: We were attacked by mechanical monsters! My friend is wounded and he can’t move. I left him nearby. Help us!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N031
Reply.text: I’ll help you, stranger!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P041
Reply.text: Follow me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: We haven’t heard from the people of Uluk for a some time now. Please help us find out what happened to them!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: Why don’t you go there yourself?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Not all monsters are defeated yet, it’s way too dangerous to go out. Only you can overcome the dangers of the journey reasonably quick.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P042
Reply.text: I’ve got more important things to do.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P041
Reply.text: All right, I'll figure it out.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: A guest on a steel steed is our friend!

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: What happened to you, people? Why did you forget your neighbors?

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: We don’t need help from arrogant druids. Tell them to stay away from us. We have found ourselves new powerful gods, whose flesh is stronger than stone and whose anger is fiercer than lightning.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: I’ll pass on your message to them. Is there anything else I can do?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N01
Reply.text: Psst, foreigner, listen: the village is dying and the inhabitants are suffering. Not everyone has gone mad, many are against this change, but they fear the wrath of the monsters. All who could, have left, but they alone cannot reach Seth. You will meet them at the agreed place. I beg you, help these people to escape.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P02
Reply.text: What’s going to happen to you?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N03
Reply.text: I’m staying. I’ve got to find out what causes this machine-craze and talk some sense into the elder.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P042
Reply.text: Why should I care? You'll have to deal with this on your own.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P041
Reply.text: I’ll help them. May the luck be on your side, too! Farewell.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m1_RescueUlukCivil'); CreateTeam('RescueCars',1064,CVector(getPos('RescueCiv_loc')),{'r1m1_bug02','DemoMolokovoz1'}); TActivate('trRescArmyPlace'); TActivate('trRescArmyDie'); TActivate('trWentCivCamp'); SetTolerance(1100,1064,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1019,1064,RS_ALLY); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(1); SetVar('BezhenAlive', 0) EndConversation();

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: What happened in Uluk?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P022
Reply.text: The elder came to believe in new gods and now worships metal monsters.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N032
Reply.text: Sad news. You’ve earned your reward, though. Go with peace.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P042
Reply.text: Good bye.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P021
Reply.text: The elder came to believe the new gods and he worships metal monsters now. Those people will explain it to you.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N031
Reply.text: You’ve changed our opinion of the foreigners. Take it - it's your reward. If you have to pass through our places, you can always count on our help!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P041
Reply.text: Thank you. I’m glad there are still people who live in harmony with nature.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N01
Reply.text: You're back already! What did the Oracle tell you? Do you know how to cross the desert?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N02
Reply.text: I got more questions than answers after my visit to the Oracle. At least I know we are on the right track! Tell me where I can find other discs, like the one I’ve given to the Oracle? Or give me the name of a person who was close to Ivan Go.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N03
Reply.text: Of all people, only Ben Throttle may know something about him. He lives near Midgard. He’s an old explorer and a friend of Ivan. He should be able to help you.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N04
Reply.text: Then we must meet him. Show us the way.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N01
Reply.text: Don’t pass by, stranger. I’ve got a special offer for people like you!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N02
Reply.text: Consider me intrigued. What can you offer me?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N03
Reply.text: Only today! You can get the map of this land! And it’s almost free!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N04
Reply.text: And how much is this ‘almost free’?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N05
Reply.text: It’s only 50 coins. And not a coin less.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06c
Reply.text: Thanks, but no. I'll get by without your map.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06b
Reply.text: I’ll take it for 30 coins and we’ll part friends.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N07b
Reply.text: I told you: the price is final. 50 coins and not a coin less.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08bb
Reply.text: Whatever. Find other fools to buy your stupid map.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08ba
Reply.text: All right, you greedy bastard. Here are your 50 coins.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06a
Reply.text: I could really use a map. It’s a deal.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N01
Reply.text: I have heard that you are heading for the Oracle.
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('q_VisitDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN and QuestStatus('r3m1_ClearSanctuary_ReturnDruid2')==Q_COMPLETED and not(IsQuestTaken('q_PlaceWithSign')) and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N02
Reply.text: You heard right. I do seek his advice.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N03
Reply.text: Could you do me a little favor?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04b
Reply.text: I’m sorry, but I’ve enough problems on my mind.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04a
Reply.text: Sure, what can I do for you?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N05a
Reply.text: A good friend of mine has gone off in search of the Oracle and never came back. I heard he’s made a new home there, not far from the Oracle's dwelling. If you see him, stop by and give him a package from me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N06a
Reply.text: Where exactly does he live?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N07a
Reply.text: I was told about this place. Right here, by the old road.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N08a
Reply.text: I’ll pass him your message and your package.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N01
Reply.text: Traveller, I see that you are a good man. Take this book about our history.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N02
Reply.text: I’m not really that interested in history.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N03
Reply.text: I don't like killing good people…

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N04
Reply.text: It was an honor to talk to you and thanks for the book. I’ll treasure it!

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N05
Reply.text: That’s better. You can go now.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N06
Reply.text: Thanks. Good bye!

Reply.name: Aborigen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You got me, demons! First my fields and now you want to take me! I’m not going to give in so easily!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000549
Reply.text: Good evening to you, too.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000550
Reply.text: You’re one of them – I saw you on the burning field, in a pilar of flame!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001159
Reply.text: I see, another harmless madman…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000551
Reply.text: Don’t worry, good man. The power of science will drive demons from your fields. I saw it happen before.

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I greet you, lost soul. I see the void in your heart that has to be filled with faith. Help our church and you’ll be blessed.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001133
Reply.text: I’m not sure I need it... But what exactly do you ask for?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001247
Reply.text: Spiritual balance of our congregation has been disturbed by the presence of two pagans. They are confusing the minds of our people with heresy! Kill the heretics and bring me their heads. It’ll restore spiritual harmony of our people and clear their minds from unnecessary doubts in their faith. And you will receive a blessing and a generous reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001249
Reply.text: I can do without your blessing.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001248
Reply.text: I am willing to help the church!

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you done the deed yet?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001252
Reply.text: I haven’t found the heretics yet.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001251
Reply.text: Yes, here are the heads of the two heretics. They’ll no longer sow discord in the souls of your people.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001250
Reply.text: Here’s your reward. I bless you for your future efforts in the name of our church! May fortune be on your side.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001253
Reply.text: Thank you.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_ReturnHeadsQuest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head1'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head2'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 2 ); AddPlayerMoney( 1000 ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hey, driver! Would you mind dropping some junk off at the village to a contact of mine? It's not far from here. Give it to him, and he'll pay you well. I could do it myself, but I have too much work to do - I have to collect the trophies left on the battlefields of the bandits.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001259
Reply.text: As if I had nothing better to do than to haul your trophies.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001135
Reply.text: Sounds like a cushy job. Load your stuff.

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Aha, you brought me that engine. Thank you. Here's your hard-earned cash.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001255
Reply.text: The money is nice and all, but what I don’t get is why am I driving back and forth with this busted engine?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001254
Reply.text: It’s business, pal. I can't just tell you my secrets.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001256
Reply.text: Smells fishy…

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg2
Reply.text: It’s you again. What is it this time?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001261
Reply.text: I still don’t understand, what was the point of driving this broken engine back and forth? Tell me your secret.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001263
Reply.text: It won't be cheap. It’ll cost you 2000 to satisfy your curiosity.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001260
Reply.text: That’s way too much. I’m not that desperate to hear it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001264
Reply.text: That must be a hell of a secret for 2 grand! Spit it out!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001262
Reply.text: I collect working car parts that are left on the battlefield and send them to my repairman friend. He sometimes replaces the good parts in the cars that he fixes with the ones that I send him and returns me the good ones, which I sale at a very nice margin. That’s how we make our living.|Now that you know everything, I’ll have to kill you. Ha-ha-ha! Got ya! All right, go in peace and don’t even think of pulling the same scam in our region or you'll be in big trouble.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001265
Reply.text: Clever enough.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: That’s the engine I’ve been waiting for so long. Here’s your reward, stranger.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001137
Reply.text: Easy money.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Could you take this engine back to Marezzia? You’ll get paid, of course.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001258
Reply.text: Do you take me for a fool? I’m not going there for this.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001257
Reply.text: I don't care about the details of the job, as long as I get paid to do it.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000452
Reply.text: People told me I can get a job and some answers to my questions here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000453
Reply.text: That's a possibility. Who are you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000454
Reply.text: I’m new here, came from the east. I’ve heard a lot about your leader, Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000455
Reply.text: Oh, yes! He’s a great man! For him, nothing is impossible.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000456
Reply.text: I’d like to meet him in person.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000457
Reply.text: That's unlikely... You know, there are traitorous people who want him dead. So it's not easy for a mere mortal to see him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000458
Reply.text: Is there absolutely no way to meet him? I've been waiting my whole life for this...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000459
Reply.text: I said it's ‘not easy’, but I didn’t say ‘impossible’. Axel awards war heroes in person. Join our army and prove yourself a great warrior. Then you might get a chance to shake his hand.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000460
Reply.text: Who are you fighting with?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000461
Reply.text: Our enemies are the northerners. They turned their backs on us when we really needed their help, so we have no pity for them anymore. Axel will lead us to the era of prosperity, and only the miserable neighbors are standing in our way. Not for long now, not for long…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000462
Reply.text: Now I understand what ideals you are fighting for.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000463
Reply.text: So, are you with us or against us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000465
Reply.text: I’m with you, of course. And I'll try to do something remarkable to meet Axel as soon as possible.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000468
Reply.text: Start small. For now, the most important thing for us is not to give the enemy a moment's rest. Go to the border and attack anything that moves. What you loot is yours. We'll keep in touch by radio.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000469
Reply.text: Yes, sir!
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('SNGPROVIANT'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r2_AR_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000464
Reply.text: Perhaps, there is another way to meet Axel…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000466
Reply.text: That's up to you. But keep in mind, we are simple people and don’t like people who waste out time with pointless talk.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000467
Reply.text: Understood, I wasn't born yesterday.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg1
Reply.text: So, are you willing to give your life for the righteous cause of Crimson Dawn?

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg2
Reply.text: The operation has been more than successful. We got hold of an important strategic object, while you were distracting the enemy. Get your share of the trophies.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000472
Reply.text: That was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000473
Reply.text: The next task is going to be more complicated. Now it's up to you to infiltrate the rear of the enemy and cut off his supplies. To do this, you will have to blow up transports with provisions and essential goods. What you can grab is yours, as usual. Carry out!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000474
Reply.text: That’s my kind of job.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You’ve done great harm to the northerners’ economics. The rest is up to us.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000476
Reply.text: When am I going to see Axel?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000477
Reply.text: Not so fast. Keep on serving our people as well as you do and he will personally award you. Our good friends the monks want to get to know you. They are doing us an invaluable service, keeping the morale of our men up with prayers... and great wine! Go to the monastery and arrange with them for another shipment of that spirit-rising drink.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000478
Reply.text: What kind of silly assignment is this? At a time when there is war all around...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000479
Reply.text: Do not underestimate the power of faith.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000480
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg4
Reply.text: You are late. Did you bring the wine?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000502
Reply.text: Yes, the barrels are in the truck.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000504
Reply.text: Good. You don’t need to tell me anything. I’m afraid of the monks myself. Anyway, let’s get down to business. We know that there are traitors among us.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000505
Reply.text: Who are they?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000506
Reply.text: It’s the rebels who are disgruntled with the regime. They corrupt our economics from inside. They are like worms that slowly kill the tree by gnawing on its bark. We know the location of their base. The rebels are not expecting an attack, so they should be an easy target. You’ve got to kill them all.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000507
Reply.text: Killing the unarmed… What if I refuse?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000508
Reply.text: Then we will know that there is another traitor in our ranks.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000509
Reply.text: I’ll carry out your order.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg5
Reply.text: What are the results of the negotiations?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000526
Reply.text: The Defense leaders agreed to meet me here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000527
Reply.text: It went too easy. The enemy is treacherous, so it may easily be a trap. In any case, we should go there and fight.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000528
Reply.text: I’d like to take part in the operation!

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Welcome, my son. You have recently performed many glorious deeds for our common cause that have not escaped our attention. We decided to get to know you better.
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FindROMinCastle') and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FindROMinCastle')) and IsQuestComplete('d_SinFather_Quest') and not(IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FightFelix')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FightFelix'))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000482
Reply.text: I don't really get what you're talking about...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000483
Reply.text: A lost wayfarer came to us and said he knows you well.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000484
Reply.text: What's that supposed to mean? Who is it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000485
Reply.text: He also said that you swore to exterminate all bandits in the world...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000486
Reply.text: Me? That’s a lie! I… I’ve nothing against bandits… I’m a bandit myself!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000487
Reply.text: I believe you, my son. But such accusations are quite serious, and we must find out which of you is right. May God settle the dispute... in a battle to the death on the arena! Whoever survives is proven right.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000490
Reply.text: But who's my opponent?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000491
Reply.text: Old Felix.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000492
Reply.text: What? Felix?!

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Welcome, my son. You have recently performed many glorious deeds for our common cause that have not escaped our attention. We decided to get to know you better.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000489
Reply.text: I’ve got nothing to hide. Ask me anything you want.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000493
Reply.text: No questions needed. One look is enough to decide if you are worthy or not. We test everyone who joins our crusade. That’s the secret of our invincible army.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000494
Reply.text: So what about me?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000495
Reply.text: You are a hard nut to crack. One thing is certain: you are bringing changes. Some people say we should kill you at once. But I think you should live.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000496
Reply.text: Good to hear... But what makes you think so?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000497
Reply.text: Our mission is not slaughter in this region. It’s something greater than that. So is your mission. Leave with peace and don’t forget the wine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000498
Reply.text: It’s nice to deal not with fanatics, but with sensible people.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You’ve proved you were right. You can go back and don’t forget the wine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000500
Reply.text: Oh, sure! That’s what I came here for...

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg3
Reply.text: The holy voice brought you to our abode.

Reply.name: Mopl_he
Reply.text: I know Alice is here! Give her to me, or I'll blow your monastery to pieces!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000538
Reply.text: We are not your enemies. Do not disturb us with your rants.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000539
Reply.text: With Axel's defeat, your grip on power is gone as well. If not me, then others will burn the place down. I'm gonna count to three before I start. One... Two...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000540
Reply.text: Open up your eyes, my child! Turn around and you'll see that she is leaving the walls of this monastery in haste.

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who are you, stranger, and what do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000511
Reply.text: I punish traitors of Axel’s cause.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000512
Reply.text: We mean no harm to anyone! We are fighting for the just cause. Have some mercy! We have families waiting at home…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000514
Reply.text: I'm not a murderer, it's just the way life is... Run away before it's too late.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000515
Reply.text: Thank you! We will be leaving for Librium, but I have valuable information that must be delivered urgently to the leadership of the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000516
Reply.text: I don’t belong in the Crimson Dawn anymore. I’m now a fugitive, same as you. Get in, I’ll give you a lift.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000513
Reply.text: Die, in the name of the Crimson Dawn!

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I’m the leader of the rebels. Have you come to pick me up?

Reply.name: Lag_hlg08871
Reply.text: I have to take you to Helvetia. And you’d better know something really important.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg0
Reply.text: The night is long…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000520
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. I’ve got intelligence of the imminent operation against the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000521
Reply.text: We are willing to help you in exchange for intelligence.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000522
Reply.text: This information is too important to entrust to an ordinary agent. There are traitors everywhere: I can only trust the highest-ranking personnel. What I know will decide the outcome of the war!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000523
Reply.text: We have anticipated this outcome. Our leaders will be meeting you there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000524
Reply.text: I'll get there at once.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I don’t think I know you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000542
Reply.text: The night is long…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000543
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. Hello, comrade.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000544
Reply.text: I’ve come to discuss our plans for cooperation.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000546
Reply.text: Thank God, you’ve arrived. But it's not safe here. Our leader will be here in 5 minutes and he will answer your questions. Good luck!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000547
Reply.text: The tyrant will be defeated.

Reply.name: Axel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I’m Axel. I heard you were looking for me?!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000533
Reply.text: At last we meet, Axel. Can’t say it was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000534
Reply.text: I respect your determination, but I’m afraid you won’t survive our meeting. I am curious to see if you are as tough and as agile as they say you are.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000535
Reply.text: I’m ready for any tests, as long as they serve my end.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000530
Reply.text: I’m glad I can finally look you in the eye, Axel. The truth is that I came here to take your life. I challenge you to a fight!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000531
Reply.text: I accept the challenge, even though I don't want to take your life. To the arena, brothers. Let's see who's more worthy of glory! I'll wait for you there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000532
Reply.text: To the arena!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Need cash? I could use your skills.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001110
Reply.text: Go on…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001119
Reply.text: My house was looted a couple of days ago. The house-breakers took something really valuable to me – a work of art. Only an antiquities connoisseur could do such a thing. And there is only one man, besides myself who’s interested in that sort of thing around here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001121
Reply.text: Sounds like too much work. I don’t want to get involved in it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001120
Reply.text: Let’s teach the bastard a lesson.

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Oh, you’ve brought the masterpiece! Give it to me and take your money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001122
Reply.text: I might get a better price elsewhere for this piece of art.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001116
Reply.text: Take your precious…

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001111
Reply.text: Let’s not beat about the bush. Was it you who stole the masterpiece from Aesthete?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001124
Reply.text: Yes, but… I'm very sorry, but I no longer have it. This man came to me and offered to steal a famous work of art for me. We worked out a plan of breaking into Aesthete’s house. I made the advance payment and never saw him again. I really, really regret getting involved with a criminal. But I was so eager to get my hands on such a beauty... Perhaps you will be able to find the guy who deceived us both. He called himself Swindler. I met him in a small canyon nearby. He might still be there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001125
Reply.text: Rest assured, I will find him. But if you lied to me, I’ll come back for you.

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you got the masterpiece? Give it to me! I’ll pay generously...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001123
Reply.text: I prefer to keep it for the time being.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001118
Reply.text: Here it is.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: A source told me that a rich caravan is heading south almost unguarded. It’s a sure thing. I give you a lead, you give me half the loot. Deal?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001127
Reply.text: No way.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001126
Reply.text: I’ll be waiting here for you and my share.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001128
Reply.text: I’ll be back.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: We are in luck! If we find a right buyer, I'am… um, we’re set for the rest of our lives! Wait, what is this here... Damn it, it’s the Big Boss’s mark – no one in their right mind will buy this stuff from us! And in case you didn’t know – people who steal from the Big Boss don’t live long.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001129
Reply.text: You can keep whole thing, I'll pass. I don’t need no trouble.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001112
Reply.text: Sounds like a lot of money. Who’s the Big Boss? We should get to him before he finds out about the robbery.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001130
Reply.text: They say he lives in an base at the top of a mountain, I heard it's a fortress. I’ll hide the loot and lure the guards out. It’ll be your chance to get in and kill the Boss.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001131
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What do you want, my rescuer?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000448
Reply.text: Has Alice been here?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000449
Reply.text: Yes, sir. She left in a hurry and she was heading to Helvetia, as far as I know.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000450
Reply.text: Now she won’t get away from me!

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I'm busy with important administrative matters.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000642
Reply.text: It’s urgent! You’ve got to switch off the electric power station. The destiny of the mankind depends on you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000648
Reply.text: Are you out of your mind? The station supplies several towns with energy. I’m not going to leave people without heat and light because of some crazy idea you got.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000649
Reply.text: Do you realize that the station is also powering the alien invaders base?!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000643
Reply.text: I don’t understand you. Come to think of it, there have been some energy leaks lately… But that doesn't change my mind!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000645
Reply.text: Take charge of your life for once! The future of the humanity is in your hands. All you need to do is turn off the station for a few minutes!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000647
Reply.text: How do you imagine that? For a few minutes... Do you think it’s that simple? An emergency stop would shut down the station for 24 hours, no less. But then again, it’s time for maintenance inspection. Go look for your green men!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000651
Reply.text: You’ve done the world a great favor!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000644
Reply.text: They I'm gonna have to blow up this hole! The guys from the Crimson Dawn will be more than happy to help me...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000646
Reply.text: Easy, man. You are a war hero and you’ve probably got a psychological trauma. I’ll help you. See, the electricity is off!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000650
Reply.text: It’s your luck that I’m in good mood today. People like you drive me nuts when they stand in the way of saving the world.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What is it now?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000656
Reply.text: Have you noticed anything unusual lately? Any people acting strange?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000657
Reply.text: There’s an anomalous zone nearby, so people are often acting strange around here. Some of them say they saw metal objects in the sky.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000658
Reply.text: I should definitely get there. Thanks for telling me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001268
Reply.text: Damn! That malfunction again. Go away! I'm busy repairing that station!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001269
Reply.text: All right, all right.

Reply.name: SelBarmen_hellodlg0
