Reply.text: I haven’t seen you here before.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz471
Reply.text: I’m a stranger here. I had to cross the mountains to get this far.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz472
Reply.text: The fact that you got through the tunnel says a lot about your battle skills. Or did you decide to become a mercenary and came by arrangement with a recruiter?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz473
Reply.text: Not really. I don’t know much about your country and I don’t want to get involved in your conflicts.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz474
Reply.text: It’s a miracle! A war dog comes here for a reason other than killing people for money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz475
Reply.text: Live and let live, that's what I was taught.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz476
Reply.text: Sooner or later, you’ll have to take sides. You can either be friend, or foe here. There’s no third option.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz477
Reply.text: Still, I want to work it out for myself, before I take sides in this war.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz478
Reply.text: Join us, warrior. We are fighting against the treacherous aggressors. We are fighting for the right cause.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz479
Reply.text: I can't take your word for it. As I said, I want to make my own conclusions before I make any choice.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz480
Reply.text: You know what? Go to Tous. People there will tell you everything you need to know about the aggressors. They might also help you in your search.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz481
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Are you ready to join our army?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz483
Reply.text: Tell me, what is this war for?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz484
Reply.text: We are fighting for justice against the brute aggressors!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz485
Reply.text: I think I’ve heard it somewhere before. I’ll go look for answers someplace else.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz486
Reply.text: Hold on. Take this leaflet. Perhaps, when you know the history of this country better, your heart will tell you what to do next.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz487
Reply.text: Okay, I'll flip through it. ... What it says in the leaflet is indeed awful! But what do I have to do with it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz488
Reply.text: We need every man who can fight back. Things are looking really dark now. We’d be grateful for any help we can get.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz489
Reply.text: Admittedly, I came to your region to have a proper talk with Axel, and in this our interests coincide.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz490
Reply.text: Join our army. Together we have a better chance of getting to Axel. Which isn’t easy at all: we sent our best assassins to him, but they all failed.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz491
Reply.text: But why? What stopped them?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz492
Reply.text: Besides the fact that Axel is always traveling with heavy security and that there's a hostile country filled with heavily armed thugs between him and us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz493
Reply.text: Yes, apart from that.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz494
Reply.text: No one knows for sure where his hideout is. They say he turned an underground base into a garden city, but so far we haven't been able to pinpoint its exact location. I repeat, not yet. So you're in?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz496
Reply.text: We’ll do away with Axel’s tyranny together!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz499
Reply.text: Thank you, stranger. Rest assured, your deeds will not be forgotten.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz500
Reply.text: When do I start?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz501
Reply.text: Immediately. Go patrol the border. Make sure no enemy scout crosses it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz502
Reply.text: You can rely on me.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); TActivate ('SERCHSIDELINE'); AddHistory( 'r2_SNG_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1016, RS_ALLY ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1015, RS_ENEMY ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz495
Reply.text: I need to think about it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz497
Reply.text: Of course, you're free to leave at any time, unlike the locals...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz498
Reply.text: Don’t push me. I’ve got my own head on my shoulders.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you willing to join us?

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg2
Reply.text: My people owe you their lives. You are a truly fearless fighter. I'm sorry we didn't send you on a real mission right away, but we needed to test you to see what you were capable of.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz504
Reply.text: Now you’ve seen me in battle. I’ll do what it takes to reach Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz505
Reply.text: Keep at it, and you'll get your opportunity. In the meantime, it's the common people who need your protection. To keep the country alive, we need to send humanitarian aid to towns and villages from time to time. Your job is to protect the transportation!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz506
Reply.text: I've done this kind of work before. Sounds easy enough.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz507
Reply.text: Don't get complacent! The enemy will do his best to leave us without the supplies. But you will not be alone. Good luck!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz508
Reply.text: I can handle it, don't worry!

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg3
Reply.text: The provision will help us to hold out for a while longer. Thanks to you! The time for a decisive response is approaching.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz510
Reply.text: Don’t get me wrong: I certainly enjoy doing acts of kindness, but let’s not forget about the ultimate goal.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz511
Reply.text: Our enemies get support from the other side of the mountain range. But if we block the tunnel, we'll cut them off from reinforcements.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz512
Reply.text: Why haven’t you done it before? The tunnel is on your territory, isn’t it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz513
Reply.text: Believe me, we've had higher priorities: war is not all about open confrontation. Now it’s time to block that artery. Remember, it’s guarded by elite soldiers...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz514
Reply.text: Do you call those elite? I’ve already defeated one of them and it wasn’t hard at all.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz515
Reply.text: That's how they're recruiting. Probably told you what a tough soldier you were and offered to be one of them, haven’t they?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz516
Reply.text: Yes… Their exact words… They are not as simple as you might think.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz517
Reply.text: I’m afraid, we can't dedicate any more troops to support the operation. You’ll be on your own.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz518
Reply.text: It wouldn't be the first time. Get my medals ready!

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Your successes against our common enemy have not gone unnoticed, you have disrupted the war plans of the bandits. Now it is time to assign you a task that can turn the tide of the war in our favor!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000432
Reply.text: Let’s hear it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000433
Reply.text: Our spies report that there is a growing resentment with the tyrant in the enemy’s camp. Your mission is to contact the rebels and learn everything you can about the enemy's defense vulnerabilities. We've been preparing for this for a long time. Don't let us down.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000434
Reply.text: I’ll do my best. How will I find the rebels?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000435
Reply.text: Meet their contact at Toscana's bar. The password is: ‘The night is long’, and the reply is: ‘But the dawn is near’.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000436
Reply.text: I got it. The enemy shall be defeated!

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg1
Reply.text: The rebel you saved has given us some very important information. One of Axel’s generals will be passing this place with only a few guards. If we capture him alive, we will have a source of valuable information about the enemy.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000438
Reply.text: He will be caught. But this operation will require a significant military force.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000439
Reply.text: We had anticipated this: barrage trucks and military vehicles had already moved to the place of ambush.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000440
Reply.text: It's nice to work with considerate people. I won't let you down.

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Truly, you have brought us luck, foreigner. The general not only revealed to us the way to get close to Axel himself, bypassing the enemy defenses, but also gave us the location and access codes to the underground city.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000442
Reply.text: I dread to even think just what you did to make him talk.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000443
Reply.text: You don’t want to know about it. Now, we distract the enemy, and you infiltrate the secret town, and kill Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000444
Reply.text: That’s what I came here for. Tell me, where do I go?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000445
Reply.text: Here, let me draw the safe route on your map. Remember, the main priority is not to reveal yourself. After the signal to start the operation, maintain radio silence.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000446
Reply.text: Let’s do it.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N03
Reply.text: Well, suppose I’m Homer. What then?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N05
Reply.text: Now we're talking! What exactly do you want to know?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N07
Reply.text: It’s not that no one can find it, it’s that no one has returned alive. And not many people want to wander that far into the middle of nowhere. I'm one of the few who are curious.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N09
Reply.text: Slow down. Now, beyond the western swamp, there's a network of valleys. If you don't get lost, you'll soon find yourself by the sea. And that's where the trouble awaits: a giant monster, smoking, gnashing its teeth, it's horrible! I barely managed to escape, and only because I was there at night. That's the story.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N11
Reply.text: That's just mean, chief. First of all, it's all true, and secondly, such a scarecrow wouldn't just stand there puffing smoke: it's guarding something. And thirdly, there's one more thing: I'm the only one who knows a place where your truck can pass through the swamp.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N13
Reply.text: Ah, I have such a kind heart. Especially after a couple of glasses. I’ll tell you where the shallow waters start. See this dead tree? That’s where it’s safe to cross the swamp. Just be careful.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P02
Reply.text: Good day. Can you tell me where I can find Homer?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P04
Reply.text: Let me buy you a glass or two and hear one of your famous stories.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P06
Reply.text: Barmen, give my friend something strong. So, Homer, tell me about the mysterious place you’ve been to that no one could find.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P08
Reply.text: Get to the point.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P10
Reply.text: What a load of bollocks. I traveled all these kilometers for this stupid story?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P12
Reply.text: I’m sorry, I overreacted, I've had a very stressful life lately. I really need to know what that monster is guarding. Do you know how to cross the swamp?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P14
Reply.text: Thank you, kind man.
Reply.scriptResult: if CanQuestBeGiven('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') then TakeQuest('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') end; CompleteQuest('FindGomerA_Quest1'); CompleteQuest('r1m3_FindVrata_KnowPlace'); SetCoordinateForQuest( 'd_FindOracul_Quest' , CVector(getPos('ToR3M1'))) EndConversation()

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_1_N01
Reply.text: You don’t often see new faces around here.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N01
Reply.text: Do you really want to hear one of my true stories?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N03
Reply.text: Conversation flows better when you have something to wash your throat with.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N05
Reply.text: [Drinks] Ooh! You’ll see a dead tree – that’s where the safe trail starts. You can cross the swamp there.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P02
Reply.text: I need to get to the other side of the swamp. Do you know where it’s safe to cross it?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P04
Reply.text: Barman, give my friend something strong. So, Homer, how do I cross the swamp?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P06
Reply.text: Thanks. Barman, one more please!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: One more visitor from the continent.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Same to you. What's the sea got to do with it?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, easy. You are in the capital of the free land! Look around, do you see any sea here?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: Everyone knows that windbag. He's always pestering people with his fairytales when he gets drunk.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Try one of the fishing villages. And don’t look at me like that: all the other settlements here, except ours, are precisely fishing villages. But we're not.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Good morning, people of the sea!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Well, this a fishing town, isn’t it?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P06
Reply.text: Admittedly, no. I apologize if I offended your patriotic sensibilities. I'm looking for old man Homer. I’m looking for old Homer. Ever heard of him?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P08
Reply.text: So, where do I find him?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P10
Reply.text: Sure, there's nothing in common! Thanks, I’ll go look for him.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: I’ve got nothing to tell you.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Too bad.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: We are fishing here.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: I see.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N01
Reply.text: Hi. Why don’t you sit down and drink a glass of ananaga with me.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02b
Reply.text: Thanks, but I’ve got things to do.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02a
Reply.text: If you are buying it, I will.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N03a
Reply.text: Heh! So that's how you play. Pay for it yourself, freeloader.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N04a
Reply.text: I’ll do without it.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N01
Reply.text: Oh, traveler. I can tell you a story if you’ve got some time to spare.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N02
Reply.text: Go on, I’m all ears.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N03
Reply.text: It happened a long long time ago. And... and it happened somewhere... umm... and then it's like… [Hrrr...]

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N04
Reply.text: Well, better let her sleep. I’ll go now.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N01
Reply.text: I’m sitting here, feeling sorry for myself.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N02
Reply.text: Why’s that?

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N03
Reply.text: Who's having an easy time nowadays?

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N04
Reply.text: Shit happens.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: The sea brings all sorts of people here… What’s up?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: He doesn't live anywhere, he's always on the go, restless soul. You might find him in the northern village.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Hello, um… fishermen!

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Does Homer live here?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000089
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000090
Reply.text: I’m looking for a man, his name is Homer.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000091
Reply.text: Yeah, I know him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000092
Reply.text: Do you know where I can find it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000093
Reply.text: He drives from one village to another, there’s no telling where he can be now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000094
Reply.text: Ok, I’ll drive on.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N01
Reply.text: What do you want from me?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N02
Reply.text: I need a special thing that looks like this one.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N03
Reply.text: Yes, I have one, I'll give it to you for a bargain... 10,000 coins will suit me just fine.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N0c
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04b
Reply.text: I don’t have enough money.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04a
Reply.text: I'll take it.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: Would you mind helping us?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Our warehouse has been captured by the locals.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N05
Reply.text: We don’t want to completelly fall out with the locals, so that's why we are asking you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000088
Reply.text: Not interested.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P04
Reply.text: Why can't you take it by force?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P06
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N01
Reply.text: Any luck clearing the warehouse?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N03
Reply.text: That beast? I doubt it… Even imprisoned, he refuses to cooperate.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N05
Reply.text: Now the van with him should be leaving the fishing village and heading this way.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P02
Reply.text: No, the damn locals are fighting like crazy. Perhaps talking to their leader will help to disband them?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P04
Reply.text: Where is he, anyway?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P06
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll find him.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N01
Reply.text: Thanks for saving me. Who are you?

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N03
Reply.text: Thank you. You have contributed greatly to the cause of freeing Hel from foreign merchants!

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P02
Reply.text: It doesn't matter right now. Get in, I'll take you to your men.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P04
Reply.text: I’ve got my own motives, but I’m glad I was of help.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Stop! Who is it?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N02
Reply.text: Easy, I'm not your enemy.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: That's for us to decide. Who are you?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N04
Reply.text: I've been given an important mission: to negotiate with you for the release of the warehouse.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: Ha! So, the merchants realized that capturing our leader wasn’t a clever idea and they are ready to set him free?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N06
Reply.text: They’ve captured your leader, you say? That’s something I didn’t know…

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: You see, we are living in difficult times. This warehouse is the only leverage we have to dictate our demands to the dirty merchants.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N08
Reply.text: And what are you negotiating?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N09
Reply.text: At this point we ask that our leader be released, only then will we leave the warehouse.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Too much trouble. It’s easier to kill you all.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N10
Reply.text: All right, I’ll help you. Where is your leader?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N11
Reply.text: If we knew, he’d be free long ago. It’s your task – to find out where they’re keeping him.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N12
Reply.text: All right, I'll see what I can find out.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_N01
Reply.text: How is it going? Do you know where they keep our leader yet?
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('TRS_Quest2')==Q_COMPLETED and QuestStatus('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest4')~=Q_TAKEN and not(IsQuestTaken('TRS_Quest4')) and not(IsQuestTaken('KillExtremist_Quest1')) and not(IsQuestComplete('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest1'))

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P02
Reply.text: I’m working on it.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P03
Reply.text: I’ve changed my mind. I'd rather kill you and take the warehouse by force.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N01
Reply.text: I can’t believe my eyes. The foreigner has kept his word and our leader is back with us!

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N03
Reply.text: Sure, comrade. Take as much as you can carry and come back anytime.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P02
Reply.text: Now to your part of the deal. Leave the warehouse.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P04
Reply.text: I’ll be back.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N01
Reply.text: What’s up?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02b
Reply.text: It's still in progress.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02a
Reply.text: The warehouse is clear, the work is done.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N03a
Reply.text: Good! Here’s your reward.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N01
Reply.text: I’m in trouble, young man…

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N02
Reply.text: What happened to you?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N03
Reply.text: My husband has gone to the market and never returned. I bet he sold the goods and went on a drinking round. I’m looking for him everywhere.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04b
Reply.text: It’s not my problem.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04a
Reply.text: I can help you find him.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N05a
Reply.text: Thank you young man, you can find me in the village of Perch.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N06a
Reply.text: At least tell me your husband's name. And describe his appearance.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N07a
Reply.text: Oh, of course! His name is Philemon. Curly-haired, with a headband. He likes to say 'get up and out of here' and he's a sucker for pink blouses.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N09a
Reply.text: I got it. I'll hit the local bars, see what I can find.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N01
Reply.text: What do you want from me, my good man?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N02
Reply.text: Philemon, your wife's out looking for you, and you're out here hanging out in bars.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N03
Reply.text: I’m sick of her. Can’t a man have a night out with the lads?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N04
Reply.text: Here, let me walk you home.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N05
Reply.text: I don't want to go home! And now I'm sick of you too, so get up and out of here!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N06
Reply.text: Better say yes while I'm still in a good mood.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N07
Reply.text: Look, why don't I slip you some money and you'll leave me alone?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08b
Reply.text: No, I promised your wife to bring you home.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09b
Reply.text: All right, let's go. You've already ruined the mood.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N10b
Reply.text: All righty then.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08a
Reply.text: All right, I’ll take pity on you. How much?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09a
Reply.text: 500 coins will do you?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N10a
Reply.text: I wouldn't expect any more from you. Give it to me.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N01
Reply.text: Have you brought my husband back?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02d
Reply.text: No. Why don’t you go and look for him yourself.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02c
Reply.text: I’m still looking.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02b
Reply.text: I found him. He’s in the village...

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02a
Reply.text: Here he is. Safe and sound.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N03a
Reply.text: I don’t know how to thank you. I’ve got some things for sale here; I’ll give them to you.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N04a
Reply.text: Thanks. See you.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hi! We are a young married couple – Connie and Blyde. Could you please give us a lift? Our car broke down and we really need to get home. We will pay you very well....

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001081
Reply.text: Nah, there's something suspicious about you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001080
Reply.text: Sure, get in.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thanks for the lift. Meet our friends! Come on, kid, let's see what's in the back of the truck. This is a robbery!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001084
Reply.text: Over my dead body! You'll get nothing.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001083
Reply.text: Damn! So, you are just a bunch of bandits. Take what you want. Just don't kill me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001085
Reply.text: Ha-ha! Let’s get out of here, guys!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001086
Reply.text: So much for trusting people again...

Reply.name: CrazyMan_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Wanna spice up you life, earn some money or simply have a nice time? The Amusement Center is for you. Want to know more?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001091
Reply.text: I’ve got no time to waste.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001088
Reply.text: Go on.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001241
Reply.text: The Amusement Center is a classy place, where all the truckers in the region go to get quality entertainment for their money. Let me show it on your map so you don't get lost. It’s right here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001244
Reply.text: I hope the center is as good as they say.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Good day, young man. Are you interested in history of architecture? Not that it matters, really. My end is near but no one wants to take an old man to his final resting place. It is a ruin of great cultural value nearby where I could find peace. Would you be willing to take me there? I’ll pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001097
Reply.text: I’m afraid I can’t help you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001098
Reply.text: I understand. Of course I'll help.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg1
Reply.text: We are finally there. Thank you. Soon I’ll find rest in one of those ancient chambers.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001243
Reply.text: Good bye!

Reply.name: Labirint_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Will you help us catch somebody who’s hiding in the town of the dead? He’s a wily old fox and somehow he always manages to get away.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001103
Reply.text: Nah, it’s not for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001100
Reply.text: At last something interesting for a change! Why do you want him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001104
Reply.text: There used to be an Amusement Center down the road, but a bunch of bandits who lost their money there destroyed it in a fit of rage. And the people of our district loved to have fun there and spend their money. We caught all the bandits who ruined our fun, but one. He is hiding in the damn town of the dead! Help us and we’ll pay you generously.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001105
Reply.text: No problem! Let's get him!

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You’ve probably come here to win some money and have fun in our Amusement Center… I’m sorry to tell you that, but we have nothing to offer you. Some bandits lost a lot of money here and razed the center to the ground in a fit of rage. But you don’t want to leave this place empty-handed, do you? Let me propose you a riddle. Pay 100 coins and you’ll get a chance to double it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001108
Reply.text: What a shame. I’m no good at riddles.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001107
Reply.text: That’s better than nothing. Go ahead. Here’s the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001234
Reply.text: Listen carefully. A Driver in White on a Black truck met a Driver in Black on a White truck on a narrow road. Who’s gonna die first?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001236
Reply.text: Driver in White.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001239
Reply.text: Wrong answer! The Driver in Black on a White truck is an ordinary long-distance driver, who looks well after his truck, but has no time to clean himself. A Driver in White on a Black truck is a bandit, who looks well after himself, but keeps his truck in a bad state. The ordinary driver will die first, because this is life, not a fairy tale, and in life bad guys always win.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001240
Reply.text: Too bad for my wallet. But that’s wrong kind of riddle...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001235
Reply.text: Driver in Black.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001237
Reply.text: Right you are! The Driver in Black on a White truck is an ordinary long-distance driver, who looks well after his truck, but has no time to wash himself. Driver in White on a Black truck is a bandit, who looks well after himself, but keeps his truck in a bad state. The ordinary driver will die first, because this is life, not a fairy tale, and in life bad guys always win.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001238
Reply.text: Stupid riddle. Give me my money.

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg1
Reply.text: The Amusement Center isn’t working. Turn round.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001242
Reply.text: What a shame…

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Where are you going? Don’t you see the road is closed?
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: The bandits finally broke into the lower floors of the military base and got themselves some really powerful guns. We thought they were just trying to intimidate us with this base to bump up our dues, but now we won't even have time to run away. If we don’t do anything, they’ll occupy our proud town.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Only two roads lead there: one of them is through our town, the other – through the bandits’ den itself!

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: No. It’s wartime, man! The town is closed until we sort it out with the bandits. We have to defend ourselves.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: What’s going on here? Why is everyone running around like crazy?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Yeah, you have it pretty hard it seems... Anyway, can you tell me how to get to the north-east?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Won’t you let me pass?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: What am I to do?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Don’t you see?! The road is closed!
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Are you done yet?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg3
Reply.text: It seems like you have some kind of question.

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who do we have here?

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Look who’s come! It’s the funny guy again! Want to tickle your nerves again? We won’t let you go so easily this time!

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You’ve got to pay 250 coins if you want to use the bridge.

Reply.name: BanditPeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Look who's here! Your money helped us a lot, you know. We bribed the guards in the town and as you can see moved to a more comfortable place to work from. So you're kind of like our sponsor now. Ha-ha! But that doesn't mean you can drive in and out of here like you're back home. We'll give you a discount, though. Ha-ha-ha! The fare for you will be just 500 coins.

Reply.name: NonBomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Welcome to Asgard!

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What brings you here?

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thanks for the help. I doubt they'll be back here anytime soon after such a warm welcome. What do you need? Some explosives? Take as much as you need. For a good man, it's no expense.

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hurry up, I'm busy!

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thank you so much! Now we can finally take a rest without worrying about our lives.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Looks like you’ve come from distant lands. Looking for business or adventures here?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: What do you want, tramp?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg15
Reply.text: So, how about my motivation? It could have been improved significantly if it had two zeros on the end.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You, again?! Now what?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Found out anything?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg4
Reply.text: What do you want, stranger?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000639
Reply.text: I’m looking for someone who lives in the far north. Could you show me the way there?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000640
Reply.text: There’s yet another problem. As you might have noticed, we're short on petrol in this town. In fact, we almost have none at all. Our caravans can't travel north and the road to Ohlm is not easy. You won't just find it on your own. If you help us, you can join them in their journey to the north and they’ll show you the road to Ohlm. Go talk to the mayor now. Tell him Sharky sent you to help with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000641
Reply.text: All right, going to him now.

Reply.name: MininWorker2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Thanks! You really helped our town and all of us. Be our guest anytime you pass by and you can always rely on a discount in our shops.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001095
Reply.text: Now that we’ve solved the petrol problem, you can follow our caravans. They’ll show you the way.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001096
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('d_MoveCanistraToMinin_Quest'); if IsQuestComplete('d_TalkAboutVrataInMinin_Quest') then TakeQuest('FindGomerA_Quest1'); TakeQuest('d_FindVrata_Quest') end; if IsQuestComplete('r1m3_FindHmirinSever') then TakeQuest('r1m4_TalkWithOldTraderAboutSecondDisk') end; RemoveQuestItem('quest_first_canistra'); AddBook('r1_book_travel_kupchina2'); TActivate ('CARAVANTOR1M4'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: WorkerForMoney_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What’s up?

Reply.name: OilMineWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Here’s the first barrel of oil.

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz447
Reply.text: I heard there is a tunnel nearby that goes through the mountains and leads to the west. Heard anything about it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz450
Reply.text: Of course I've heard it. I know about everything around here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz451
Reply.text: Won’t you tell me where exactly it starts?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz452
Reply.text: Let me mark it on your map.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz453
Reply.text: Just like that? And you don’t need my help or my money?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz454
Reply.text: Don’t teach me how to manage the business, young man.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz455
Reply.text: I wouldn't dream of it!

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You again.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz449
Reply.text: Now I see what business you were talking about. Do you happen to have a key from the tunnel door?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz456
Reply.text: Perhaps I do, if I look really hard for it. It will certainly cost me time, efforts and lost profits… 10,000 should be enough to compensate it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz465
Reply.text: Nah, I'm going to go broke with this kind of bargains. Thanks anyway.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz457
Reply.text: That’s a lot of money... Oh well, I guess I’ll have to pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz458
Reply.text: You are always welcome.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz459
Reply.text: Now I can make my way west!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('d_FindKeyInTunel_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindZasadaInTunel_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_OpenTunel_Quest'); TDeactivate ('ZASADATUNEL'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); AddQuestItem('quest_key_for_tunnel'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg2
Reply.text: In case you forgot, the key costs 10,000.

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg3
Reply.text: I’m barman. Can I help you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000632
Reply.text: Yes, you probably can. I’ve been following this girl, she should have stopped by this town or at least she should have passed it on her way.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000633
Reply.text: Let me think… Ummm... Oh, yes! She’s been here! I think she’d left through the tunnel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000634
Reply.text: The tunnel? What tunnel? Can you show it to me?

Reply.name: UnknownFromTunel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Why don’t you get something to drink while we are talking?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz467
Reply.text: Barman, pour me a drink! And something for my friend over there. Make sure his glass is always full.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz468
Reply.text: I’ll…! Get you all! You... [gulp] you don't know me... yet! What the… Hrrrrr

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz469
Reply.text: Look at you! You are drunk, my friend. And here is the key... It wasn’t that hard, after all. I’d better be going to the tunnel before anyone notices.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d174
Reply.text: Bandits will never be able to take this road again, neither will I. I’d better find another way. I’ll go ask about it in the town.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d176
Reply.text: I heard there was an explorer named Ivan who lived nearby. I'd like to visit his house.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d177
Reply.text: You’ve come to the right place: Ivan used to live in this town, actually in that house over there, with his wife and son. All was well until that dreadful night when he was out of town. His wife was killed in a nighttime attack by bandits. None of them got out alive in the end, of course. That brave woman died protecting her son. Ivan took the boy and left the town. The house has been empty ever since.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d192
Reply.text: I’ve never seen anything that matches your vivid description.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d194
Reply.text: You can try, but listen first. So, I heard it from one of my friends who heard it from one of his friends...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d196
Reply.text: Well, there's a fisherman, who tells the tale of sea treasure and a monster that guards it. No one can find the treasure, though, because only the fisherman knows the place.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d198
Reply.text: Hmmm, yeah... Oh, wait, what were you asking about?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d200
Reply.text: Can’t seem to remember his name...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d202
Reply.text: You see, at times like this, my recollection requires a little bit of motivation...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d208
Reply.text: It’s coming back to me now... It was definitely old man Homer.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d210
Reply.text: On the seashore, of course – in the fishermen’s village. But here comes another problem. You see, there’s no petrol in town, so our caravans cannot go North. And you won’t find the way to Ohlm alone.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d212
Reply.text: I don't understand what you are talking about. Listen, you seem to be a brave guy. If you help us, you can join our caravan and go North with them. They’ll show you the road to Ohlm. Go talk to the mayor first. Tell him Sharky sent you to help with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d217
Reply.text: You? Well, we actually need all the help we can get.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d219
Reply.text: It’s like in the old joke: there were 20 reasons the guns didn’t shoot. The first one – there were no ammo. Heh… Bandits captured the oil derrick and cut us off the oil. Our petrol supplies are coming to an end.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d222
Reply.text: We didn’t fight as well as we could, because we were busy solving internal problems. You see, our trade union has gone on a strike.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d224
Reply.text: In a word, yes.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d226
Reply.text: We will be very grateful!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d228
Reply.text: But the oil won't flow on its own. These bastards are sitting in a bar instead of working for the common benefit!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d233
Reply.text: What bloody "work" are you talking about? We're on strike!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d235
Reply.text: The work is hard, the pay is a pittance. That's why we refuse to work! And the mayor, the son of a bitch, is profiting from our misery.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d237
Reply.text: He's the one who ravaged it! I honestly don't even understand why we need a mayor. Especially a mayor like that. We are on strike. End of discussion!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d239
Reply.text: Don’t even ask!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d243
Reply.text: I told you! He'll never be the boss again! I’ll kick his ass when I see him.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d245
Reply.text: Sure thing.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d252
Reply.text: A gold mine, you say. Except the working conditions there are hell.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d254
Reply.text: Who told you we don’t want to? Of course we want to. If we could only get some start-up money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d261
Reply.text: Everybody needs Alice. But no one is going to get her! Ha-ha-ha!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d263
Reply.text: Do you really believe we’ll let you leave this place?! We are bandits, in case you didn’t notice… Let’s teach him some manners, guys!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d267
Reply.text: Is she a friend of yours?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d269
Reply.text: I know that girl. I wouldn’t get involved with her if I were you.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d271
Reply.text: There are dangerous people behind her.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d273
Reply.text: She often comes here on some business of her own. Mostly passing through. Last time, just recently, she was heading east. Again, I wouldn't recommend following her in that direction.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d275
Reply.text: There’s a bandits’ base there. It’s large and well fortified. Bandits won’t negotiate other than in the language of guns. Are you strong enough for that? I’m not so sure.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2149
Reply.text: Blow up the bridge.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2151
Reply.text: The one, on the road leading to the military base. If the bridge is destroyed, the enemy won't be able to reach our town.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2153
Reply.text: First of all, you need to find some explosives. They should have some in Asgard. They are miners, after all. Then you’ll have to place the charge under the bridge. It’s well guarded of course. But I’m sure you will handle that.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2157
Reply.text: In principle, you have come to the right place to buy explosives. This is the speciality of our shop, as you can see from its name. People from all over the world come here to buy our wonderful product.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2159
Reply.text: But at this particular moment, we are experiencing some production difficulties. So for the next 12 days, we won't be able to provide even the smallest amount of product. Explosives have been enjoying tremendous demand lately.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2161
Reply.text: For reasons of mere humane courtesy, I will inform you that a product of much worse quality than ours is available in the miners' village. Looks like they found an old warehouse.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2165
Reply.text: You are not the only one who wants it. Bandits are constantly attacking us to get our supplies!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2167
Reply.text: To the walls! Everyone! The enemy’s coming! Look, if you want explosives, help us protect it!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2200
Reply.text: Why don’t we just take your money and bury your corpse?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2202
Reply.text: That's what I love about the guy, his sense of humor! All right, pay and get out of here. But you know if you come around here again, I'll shoot you personally, little bugger!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den192
Reply.text: Ha ha ha, that's so funny I can't believe it. A little bastard comes right to our doorstep and demands something?! I've been feeling a wee bit gloomy lately with all the robberies and murders. Well, since you're such a cheerful character, pay 10,000 and go.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den195
Reply.text: If you manage to get the cash, bring it to us. Now get out of my eyes.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d178
Reply.text: Thank you for the story. I'd better get going.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d180
Reply.text: Take the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d181
Reply.text: The price is way too high for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d184
Reply.text: Damn! That’s not good.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d191
Reply.text: I’m looking for the Sea Gates, It should be something big. They say I’ll know when I see it. It must be somewhere around here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d193
Reply.text: I guess I’ll have to ask somebody else.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d195
Reply.text: Come on, fess up!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d197
Reply.text: So, what was the name of this storyteller?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d199
Reply.text: About the damn fisherman! Don't play fool!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d201
Reply.text: You need to try, concentrate! This is really important!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d203
Reply.text: Here are 100 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d204
Reply.text: I have nothing to motivate your mental energies at the moment...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d206
Reply.text: Here are 100 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d207
Reply.text: I’ll get you the money soon.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d209
Reply.text: Homer? Where can I find him?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d211
Reply.text: Are you trying to wring more money out of me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d213
Reply.text: I'm gonna go to the mayor straight away.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d215
Reply.text: Sharky sent me to help you with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d218
Reply.text: What is your problem?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d220
Reply.text: Are you expecting me to go and fight the bandits all on my own, when all men of the town couldn’t handle them?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d223
Reply.text: So, besides getting rid of the bandits, you want me to go and make your workers get back to work or find you some new ones?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d225
Reply.text: All right, I’ll start with the easier one: the bandits.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d227
Reply.text: Well, OK.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d229
Reply.text: [To himself] And your wallets.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d230
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do with your workers. I’ll try to talk some sense into them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d232
Reply.text: Let’s get back to work, men. Stop sitting here!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d234
Reply.text: What’s the matter?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d236
Reply.text: But he says the town is poor, the bandits have ravaged it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d238
Reply.text: But I really need to...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d240
Reply.text: I’ll have to find out what’s the fuss about mayor.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d242
Reply.text: You are right – the mayor is a thief and a liar. I found where he keeps town’s money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d244
Reply.text: Now that you are your own bosses, are you going to work?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d246
Reply.text: Get in the truck then. I'll bring you to the oil mine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d247
Reply.text: Now I'll bring this barrel to the Minin people as a sign that the oil mine is working again.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d249
Reply.text: What about the road to the North?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d251
Reply.text: I noticed the oil well nearby is idle. It's a genuine gold mine! Lots of money to be made.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d253
Reply.text: Well, do whatever you want. I’ll find other people to do your job.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d255
Reply.text: How much?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d257
Reply.text: Deal. Get in the truck.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d258
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d260
Reply.text: I need to talk to Alice!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d262
Reply.text: I know she's there. I’m not leaving without her.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d264
Reply.text: I don’t care if you are Devil incarnate! I’ll get what I came here for.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d266
Reply.text: I’m looking for a girl. She’s average height, good looking and is driving a vehicle of unusual design and color. She called herself Alice.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d268
Reply.text: No. But she has some information I really need.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d270
Reply.text: Why so?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d272
Reply.text: Cut the crap. Tell me what you know.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d274
Reply.text: Man, are you paranoid or what? Why do you see danger everywhere?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d276
Reply.text: If there's no other way, I'll have to go. See you!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2148
Reply.text: I see. What do I have to do to convince you to let me through?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2150
Reply.text: What bridge?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2152
Reply.text: How am I supposed to do that?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2154
Reply.text: [To himself] Great plan! Why don't you do it all yourself? Cowards...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2156
Reply.text: I need explosives. Now. It’s a question of life and death.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2158
Reply.text: I’m telling you, it’s urgent!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2160
Reply.text: But I really need it!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2164
Reply.text: I was told you’ve got some explosives here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2166
Reply.text: Small wonder, considering Asgard won't sell anything.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2168
Reply.text: There you go again. Not a day without battle! All right, I'll help you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2170
Reply.text: That’s great!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2201
Reply.text: Hmmm... Honor?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2203
Reply.text: Phew! That was close...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1198
Reply.text: Hold it. I’m ready to pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1199
Reply.text: Easy. I’ve almost got the right sum.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den191
Reply.text: Hey, guys... Umm, why don’t you just let me pass?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den193
Reply.text: I don’t have so much money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den194
Reply.text: Here’s the money.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('BASEATTACK'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den196
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: BaseBandit_hellodlg0
Reply.text: And what do you think you're doing here?

Reply.name: AboutThief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What's wrong?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000624
Reply.text: Someone broke into my father's house!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000623
Reply.text: I knew something had happened! I saw a suspicious-looking man prying about here. I bet it was him. He headed to the bandits’ base.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000625
Reply.text: Thanks for the hint.

Reply.name: Thief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who the hell are you? I don't know you!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000627
Reply.text: Sir, you have insulted the honour of my family! You have stolen my family treasure... I have the displeasure to speak to you and ask you to return this thing that does not belong to you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000628
Reply.text: Whaaat? I have no clue what you're babbling about.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000629
Reply.text: I'm outraged. Now I shall kill you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000630
Reply.text: Catch me if you can!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000631
Reply.text: Sir, you're a dead man!

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0
Reply.text: We're ordinary archeologists, but some scumbags are obstructing our work at a nearby dig site. We would be grateful, if you could get rid of them.
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I will see what I can do.

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: No, you're gonna have to deal with it yourself.

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Listen, pal, you look like a tough guy. Some fools are digging for treasures nearby. It's in the middle of nowhere and they don't have any weapons. I reckon they didn't spend a fortune on hiring guards either. We can earn some quick buck together.
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I’m in.

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: I won’t attack innocent people.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I believe you have business with me?

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Really? That's good news. I'll make sure everyone in town knows about it.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Yes, I want to tell you about the kick-off to the fights at the Colosseum.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Thank you. Hope to see you there.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I hope you bring good news.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Great! I must spread the word to the whole neighbourhood as soon as possible. I'll do it right away.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: We are opening a battle arena at the Colosseum.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Great to hear.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What brought you here?

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Good news indeed. Thanks for letting us know.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: We are opening a battle arena at the Colosseum.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: See you there.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0
Reply.text: The people of the Yarr are scared and refuse to harvest their crops. If they leave the fields, we’ll be short of supplies next year. Go and find out what happened there.
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestTaken('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('Signs_Quest'))

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: The problems of farmers don't interest me too much.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I'm at your service. Is it something urgent?

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I see. Lights, signs on the fields, I heard about such things before. You came to the right place. We will now undertake a campaign against superstition and scrutinise this phenomenon. If you ever see such appearsances again, do not hesitate to inform us.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: People saw lights in the sky, and then some strange signs appeared on the fields near Aeterna. People are scared. May be you can help.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Of course I will find more of them.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Calm down, young man. Tell me why you wanted to see me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000553
Reply.text: Large signs periodically appear on the field in the village of Saraevo, near the town of Toscana!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000554
Reply.text: Very well! We'll send our men down there and study the phenomenon. Here is your reward. Please inform us of similar phenomena if you come across one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000555
Reply.text: No problem. I should go.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Young man, you look excited. Do you have something to tell me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001273
Reply.text: Listen. I was at the Oracle’s island and saw some really strange signs on the fields.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001274
Reply.text: I see! I am currently investigating this phenomenon. Ignott, you say. That’s quite far from here. But there's a logic to it. I am woefully short of relevant data! I almost forgot, here’s your reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001275
Reply.text: Thanks. If I ever see something of a kind I’ll be sure to let you know.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Young man, you have contributed a great deal to my work. With the coordinates you gave me, I've figured out the exact location of the next visit! I'm so excited!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001277
Reply.text: Do you want me to accompany you?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001278
Reply.text: Oh no, not at all! I can take care of myself. However, the outcome of a matter like this can be quite unpredictable, and I would like to leave you an interesting document for safekeeping.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001279
Reply.text: What's it got to do with me, anyway? You must have archives, I assume. Why not store it there?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001280
Reply.text: I'll be honest, my recent research has somewhat tarnished my reputation... My former colleagues have stopped taking me seriously. But you saw the evidence yourself! You'll understand. Don't say another word. I beg you to accept this money as a reward for your labour. I won't need it anymore.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001281
Reply.text: All right. Give it to me. And... Good luck.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Something terrible is happening around here.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Demons have spoilt our fields. We can't harvest them anymore.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: One night we saw devilish lights over the fields. Next morning, we found there the mark of evil.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: What scares you?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: What exactly happened?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: I will go there and examine that mark.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: There really is something sinister going on here. I'm gonna get out of here before it's too late.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Me and group of other honest entrepreneurs have decided to open a battle arena at the ancient Colosseum. Best warriors from all over the world will fight there! Everything is almost ready, all that's left is to generate some decent publicity in the major towns around here. Better yet, we'd like to have our first demonstration fight. You've got a chance to be a part of a lucrative business. Give us a hand and we'll make it worth your while.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Well, this could be interesting.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Perhaps another time.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You've been a great help. Here’s your reward. Now we have to show everyone why we opened the Coliseum! Will you agree to help us one more time? Just go there and put on a real show!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000588
Reply.text: No, that's too much trouble!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: If I start something, I'm going to see it through.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2
Reply.text: That was a hell of a fight! Here’s your reward, as usual. You did a lot for the Colosseum. I've decided to offer you a stake in the business. For a mere 10,000 you will become my companion. It is a rare occasion!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: It is a large sum. I have to think it over.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3
Reply.text: If you want to be a co-owner, put in 10,000. You won't regret it.
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('BuyKollizey_Quest') and not(IsQuestComplete('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_GiveDisk2ToOrakul'))

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_1
Reply.text: Yes, here’s the money.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_2
Reply.text: No, I am not that rich yet

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Howdy, mate! Last time we met you saved my business. I owe you some. Here, that’s your part of the profit.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001271
Reply.text: It was nice having business with you.

Reply.name: Fermer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I haven't seen you around. What do you need from us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz276
Reply.text: I'm looking for Ben Throttle.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz277
Reply.text: Why should I care?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz278
Reply.text: Excuse me, are you that rude to everyone, or is it just because of my charming looks? I might appear flimsy, but I've been in fights, and more than once!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz279
Reply.text: Don't freak out. It's just that there's a lot of scum around... Anyway, who's this friend of yours?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz280
Reply.text: Ben Throttle, he is an Explorer.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz281
Reply.text: Ah, I could see you're a weirdo, aren't you? Messing around with wizards.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz282
Reply.text: With wisards?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz283
Reply.text: Don't play fool. Everybody knows that the Explorers consort with the devil! That's why they have to settle in the middle of nowhere.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz284
Reply.text: So you know where to find them, don't you?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz285
Reply.text: We haven't had those around here for a long time. But there's a witch who lives in one of the distant villages. Maybe she can tell us. Don't be mad at me, OK?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz286
Reply.text: Fine, don't be afraid. I won't turn the devils on you. Not this time!

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Thank you, my good man! We've been waiting for this cargo for a long time, the bandits have gone completely mad, they've blocked all the passages.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz306
Reply.text: Glad to have been of help.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz312
Reply.text: We're unloaded. Just a little more, and we'll be ready to head back. When you're ready, give me a sign.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz314
Reply.text: Wail a minute, I got to take a rest and refuel my car.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz313
Reply.text: Let's go right now.

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready now?

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Where the hell did you come from? You have it written on your face: ignorant farmer. No one here will even bother talking to you.

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Whoever helps the city thrive, gets our help in return. What did you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz318
Reply.text: I was told Ben Throttle lives nearby. Can I talk to him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz317
Reply.text: Ben, you say? Yeah, I know about him. He built himself a house nearby and he's been living there for a while. Let me mark it on your map.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz319
Reply.text: Finally, I will learn who I really am.

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What do you need?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz460
Reply.text: I am looking for a girl. Her name is Alice. Do you happen to know where she is now?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001287
Reply.text: Alice was here, but she left for Porto not that long ago.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001288
Reply.text: Thanks, I will keep searching.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz290
Reply.text: What's wrong?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz297
Reply.text: What do you mean what? When was the last time you looked in the mirror? Our town is the last bastion of civilisation in this damned world. And there's no place for simpletons here, especially in a museum, you'll ruin the exhibits. Go to the bar, low life.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz298
Reply.text: I was expecting the museum to be open for public. Bringing culture to the masses and all that.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz299
Reply.text: Actually, that is kind of correct... I guess I overreacted a little. Look, coincidentally right at this moment we need a brute just like you to protect the transport. You get it safely to Porto, not only will I overlook your background, but the mayor himself will shake your hand.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz300
Reply.text: You're all out of your minds with your 'civilisation'. Cannot even help a normal person. All right, I'll take your transport to the right spot. But then you'll answer all my questions!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz301
Reply.text: Absolutely! Go to the steward's office, you'll be instructed by him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz302
Reply.text: Let's see who your steward is.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Ivan, is that you!? I cannot believe... No, you are not him. Sorry, young man, I mistook you for someone I used to know. My eyes aren't as sharp as they used to be. What brings you to me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz322
Reply.text: My village was burned down. Before his death, my father said I was his adopted son and told me to find you. These are my real father's belongings. And here I stand before you not knowing what to do next.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz324
Reply.text: At last. I knew you would finally come!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz325
Reply.text: What do you mean?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz326
Reply.text: You look like just like him. Small wonder I mistook you for him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz327
Reply.text: Slow down. Explain yourself.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz328
Reply.text: Forgive me for rambling on like this. Things like this don't happen every day. Listen, your father, the real one, I mean, was a great man. His name is Ivan Go. He travelled the world, discovering new lands and technologies. He's the one who's pretty much determined the trajectory of all human development in the last, give or take, 30 years!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz329
Reply.text: You cannot be serious.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz330
Reply.text: But I am. His discoveries helped people get back on their feet. The world you see around you has only recently emerged. Years ago, we dwelled in darkness with no electricity, no way to light our home. Everyone had a reason to believe that there was no one else in the world but them. We were scared and lonely. Did you know it was your father who introduced people to radio?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz331
Reply.text: As a matter of fact, I knew nothing about my father until this moment.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz332
Reply.text: Oh, right. It’s high time to learn how great he was.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz333
Reply.text: What happened to him? Is he dead now?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz334
Reply.text: That's the thing, nobody knows. He just disappeared one day. He was a real hero then, so no one would dare to harm him. Besides, there were few who really could. Ivan made a real wonder of his truck, and a dangerous one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz335
Reply.text: You mean he may still be alive?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz336
Reply.text: It's been a long time. Don't get your hopes up.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz337
Reply.text: But you said father was the best! He knew he had a dangerous journey ahead of him, and he left a trail for me to follow to find and rescue him. This mysterious letter. And a strange disc - they will lead me to my target!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz338
Reply.text: Youth... I was that way once. You're right, let's not give up hope. I'm too old for travel, but I see you can handle anything.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz339
Reply.text: Where do I start my search?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz340
Reply.text: Your disc is no mere trinket. The disk is something like a book. But reading its contents won't be easy. If your father has recorded this book, he must have a device at home to read it. I think his secret hideout was somewhere past Pesht, in the north-east. You go there, and I'll go through the books. Maybe I'll think of something else. Safe journey.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz341
Reply.text: Thanks for the guidance. I'm departing immediately!

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Greetings, young man.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000621
Reply.text: Are you Ben Throttle? I’m looking for a thing you might know something about. It’s a plastic disc and it may have symbols "I", "G" and "2" on one of its sides.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000620
Reply.text: Let me think. Somebody did offer me to buy a disc like the one you described. I told him people in Midgard might be interested in that sort of thing.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000622
Reply.text: I was hoping you have it... Thanks for a hint, anyway.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You haven’t forgotten the old man! I’m so glad to see you again!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000653
Reply.text: I wonder if Ivan Go saw flying ships in his travels. Did he tell you anything about them, by any chance?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000654
Reply.text: He did, in fact. We used to sit on the grass telling stories. And then all of a sudden he starts telling me about the lights in the sky, the shining discs and that sort of rubbish. He mentioned Seil, and I told him...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000655
Reply.text: Seil it was! I’d love to hear the end of your story, but I have to hurry.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001282
Reply.text: But it is really important! Now that you mentioned it, I remembered one legend.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001283
Reply.text: I saw a lot of things during my travels. I have a very important and urgent task ahead of me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001284
Reply.text: That’s exactly why I want you to know this. And I have a feeling you can understand better than anyone what its deranged author was writing about. Take these notes.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001285
Reply.text: Oh well... Give it to me.

Reply.name: PortoCitizen0
Reply.text: What? Are you talking to me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz462
Reply.text: Don't you know where I can find a girl named Alice?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001289
Reply.text: Alice hadn't been here in a while. Maybe something slowed her down on her way here. Bandits are rampant on our roads... Their hideout is on the river bank further downstream.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001290
Reply.text: I'll go check it out.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg0
Reply.text: So, they sent you to protect the caravan. You look kinda flimsy... Hope you know how to drive and shoot.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz292
Reply.text: Wait, till you see me in business. Tell me where to do.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz307
Reply.text: Ok. I'll mark the destination point on your map. You have to be careful on your road there. It's a bottleneck, a good place for an ambush. Transport will drive on it's own, you need to keep up. Your job is to keep it safe on the road and deliver the cargo. Am I clear?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz308
Reply.text: Crystal clear. When are we setting out?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz309
Reply.text: Right now, if you are ready. But we can wait for you to make some last adjustments.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz311
Reply.text: I have a couple of things to do. Wait for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz310
Reply.text: I am ready to go.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready now?

Reply.name: Staruha_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who's there? I smell it in the air.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz288
Reply.text: Are you... a witch?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz293
Reply.text: How dare you, you little bastard! Have you been reading too many fairy tales?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz294
Reply.text: I'm sorry, grandma, I meant no harm. I'm looking for Ben Dro...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz295
Reply.text: And now I'm 'grandma'! Why am I even talking to you? Looking for Ben. I don't know the bastard, and I don't want to know him!|Okay, okay, I'm not doing this... It's been a long time. Last time I saw him was in Midgard. Look for him there. In the museum.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz296
Reply.text: Thank you so much.

Reply.name: Umelec_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Good day.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000590
Reply.text: I need to upgrade my truck according to this blueprint.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000596
Reply.text: Let me take a look... I see... Well, it's pretty straightforward. And it’s not going to work.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000597
Reply.text: But why? Is there something wrong with the schematic?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000598
Reply.text: No it's fine. But, the tools I’m going to need for that kind of work are very expensive.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000599
Reply.text: Money is not a problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000600
Reply.text: Besides, we’ll need a rare material – composite alloy. This is a bigger problem as it's imposible to produce in our times. Well, at the same time we can obtain it from an old detail and remelt...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000602
Reply.text: You should look in the ancient machinery.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000603
Reply.text: I wonder where I can get such a thing. Any idea, what kind of machinery do I need?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000604
Reply.text: You’ll recognize it by its distinctive bluish tint. In fact, warriors in the Colosseum often bet on various rare items. It might just be what you need. And remember to bring me 100,000 cash for the work.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000605
Reply.text: Thank you. At least I know where to look now.

Reply.name: Umelec_hellodlg1
Reply.text: If you still want to upgrade your truck, bring me the composite alloy and 100,000 cash.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000613
Reply.text: Yes, I remember that.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000612
Reply.text: I brought you the money and the alloy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000614
Reply.text: Look at that! It’s going to be enough for several trucks! I’m ready to work for only 90,000 if you let me keep the rest of the material.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000615
Reply.text: There you are.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000616
Reply.text: It’s going to take a couple of hours. Wait here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000617
Reply.text: All right.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000618
Reply.text: Check it out!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000619
Reply.text: Now I can finally find out what lies beyond the desert.

Reply.name: Fighter1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What’s up, brave guy? Ready to fight and win?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000606
Reply.text: I might, if the reward is good enough. Have you got any artifacts made of composite alloy?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000610
Reply.text: Let me think… I’ve got one in my truck. You can have it if you win. But it's a fight to the death! The winner takes it all. Deal?

Reply.name: Fighter2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What is it? Ready to fight me on the Arena?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000607
Reply.text: I am, as long as the reward is worth fighting for. Have you got composite alloy?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000608
Reply.text: You aren’t a true warrior, if it’s only the reward you are interested in. Go ask the lady warrior. She’s won many battles; she may have the thing you need.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What do you want? I'm busy.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000636
Reply.text: Has anybody offered you to buy a strange-looking object in a form of a disc lately?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000637
Reply.text: In fact, somebody did offer to buy the kind of object you described. But we weren’t interested, so he went on, to the north.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000638
Reply.text: To the north, you say… And the village is getting further and further away... Thanks for the information.

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hey, kid, you got a truck?

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Great! We've been thinking about it and decided that it's about time to bring some order to our county. We need brave men with sturdy vehicles to attack bandit's base! Are you with us? If you're in, try to keep up...

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Yeah, I have the most menacing vehicle on these roads!

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Sure, I'm in. Let's start with one gang, and then tackle the rest of them.

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: No, I have enough problems as it is.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I see you have some powerful connections, young man. Would you do me a small favor?
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken( 'WorkGiver_Quest1' )) and (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'TalkWithFather_Quest' )) and QuestStatus('Buyer_Quest1')==Q_COMPLETED

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I happened to catch your acquaintance, Sergo, while I was here on business. I have an important proposal for him, which will lead to mutually beneficial cooperation. But, unfortunately, I don't have the necessary documents with me...

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Please bring me to the gas station nearby as fast as possible. I could then collect all the necessary documents and get back here on my own.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: It depends… I’m listening.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Keep it simple, what do you need?

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Get in, show the way.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: No, that’s just too far. My father is waiting for me at home.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You have spoiled the most important deal of my life! Go away!

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Easy, man...

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Yeah... You could have been quicker. I still have to find and prepare all the paperwork.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000558
Reply.text: Pay and get out of my car!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000559
Reply.text: I'll find another driver on the way back, a faster one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000557
Reply.text: Listen here Richard, I'm gonna give you three seconds; exactly three-freaking-seconds to wipe that stupid looking stache wearing smug look off your face or I will... hey, where are you going?

Reply.name: Medik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kid! Are you a traveler? You don't have to answer, I can tell that... Do you want me to tell you where the abandoned hospital is? I know about it. I'm sure there's lots of interesting things to find there. I don't want to go, there are bandits all over... But you're a daring guy! For a mere 25 coins, I'll mark the place on your map.
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestItemPresent( 'quest_medicine_box' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestFailed( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' ))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000562
Reply.text: I won’t waste my money on that.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000561
Reply.text: Sounds interesting, here's the money!

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I’m an old soldier and I've seen some... things. There were times people would shudder at the sound of my name. I had a cool truck and lots of guns! It’s all in the past now... My legs can't walk anymore and all I do is telling stories for money. Toss the old man ten coins and I'll teach you how to live... Cough-cough.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000564
Reply.text: Let’s give it a try.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000578
Reply.text: Kid, always keep and eye on the fuel level in your tank, if it runs out in the middle of nowhere, you're in a big trouble! Cough-cough... That's it!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000579
Reply.text: Cheater, I knew it already!

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Hehe, boy, so you want to hear some more wisdom? Well, all right, give me another 15 coins!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000574
Reply.text: No thanks!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000566
Reply.text: What? 15?! Well ok.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000580
Reply.text: Remember, lad! During the battle, when you are surrounded by these petty bandits, the main thing is not to stand still... Spin around and fire all the guns! This way it will be harder for them to hit you... I remember once three of them surrounded me at the same time! But this story is for a fee....

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000581
Reply.text: Hmm, interesting...

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You again? You are curious indeed. He-he... Hand over 20 coins, I gotta grab another cold one at the bar.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000575
Reply.text: I'm not interested.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000568
Reply.text: Take it...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000582
Reply.text: You think you're such an ace, badass driver! I'll tell you what, you're not worth a little finger on my leg! If you want to be swift as a wind, then drive on the roads!
