I know they're not very good in our area, but dirt and sand will slow you down. Stick to the roads and no one will be able to catch up with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000583
Reply.text: That's an interesting point of view.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg3
Reply.text: I see you like the tales of an old soldier. And I like the sound of coins in my pockets. Hand me 25 coins!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000576
Reply.text: It’s a waste of money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000570
Reply.text: You are truly interesting person, here's the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000584
Reply.text: Listen, boy. All those farmers around here don't understand a thing in the commerce. If you're smart, you can easily buy cheap goods in one village and sell them at double the price to their neighbors!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000585
Reply.text: Thanks for the sound advice.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Hell, why are you bothering me again? I'm out of stories already! All right, all right, give me 30 coins and listen to the old man for one last time.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000577
Reply.text: I can do well without your advice.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000572
Reply.text: Here’s 30 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000586
Reply.text: Kid, you're a dumbass! If you were smart, you wouldn't waste your time talking to a crazy old man in this godforsaken bar, you'd go out and make money or explore the world! If I had a piece of paper, I'd write you a 'Laziest Explorer and Traveller' diploma. If you still want to prove to yourself how cool you are, try to find a botanist in this county. I might not have wasted my time on you after all.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000587
Reply.text: I've learned a lot about life.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Oh, greetings, stranger! I sit here all day cultivating my beautiful plants. They grew ill lately. They need to be cured and placed in a new greenhouse. Please bring me some medicine so I can save my beloved plants! There was an old hospital nearby. As a reward, I'll give you some weapons that I found in the wreckage of burning cars on these roads.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000592
Reply.text: I’ll try to find what you need!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000589
Reply.text: I’ve got some medicine in the trunk.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); CompleteQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_medicine_box'); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'hornet01', 2, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'specter01', 1, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000594
Reply.text: It doesn’t concern me.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you found it?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Look who’s there. Not empty-handed, I hope?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Yes, that's me! And you must be Peter’s son. You’re all grown up now, travelling on your own... These are dangerous times: the bandits have gone mad. I barely made it to Sowth, lost two guards on the road. This might be my last trip here.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: You're a quick learner, young man! OK, let's see...|The goods are excellent, as always. Here you go, this is your reward for the delivery.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Good day, sir. Are you Sergo, by any chance? I brought you a package from Glukhoe.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I see. That’s my first solo trip. Should we get down to business then?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Thanks, I wasn't actually counting on anything.
Reply.scriptResult: SetRadarUpgrade(1); TActivate('DestroyGloohoe'); TActivate('RETURN_TO_FATHER'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_potato'); CompleteQuest( 'Buyer_Quest1' ); TakeQuest('TalkWithFather_Quest'); AddBook('r1_book_the_mask'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You've been a great help. Say hello to your father.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Sure thing. Thank you.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You're all grown up now. Do the right thing, son, so I don't have to feel embarrassed because of you.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: I won't let you down.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001245
Reply.text: I hope so.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001246
Reply.text: See ya.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Want something to drink, young man?

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Of course, you can take it! Everything's in perfect condition.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: The barman of Sowth sent me to pick up something that belong to him.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000593
Reply.text: Actually, I don't think there's enough room in your trunk.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000595
Reply.text: Oh, I see.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Thanks a lot. Now I will hunt Felix down!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Aren't you from Glukhoe?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: We heard and we're sorry for your loss. These things happen. Drinks are on the house.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Never heard of him... No wonder, we're in the middle of nowhere. Try your luck in Aeterna. There's a trade route there, maybe you'll find out something.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Glukhoe was attacked. Everybody's dead. My father...

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Thank you, but no need. I'm leaving this place. Have you heard about Ben Throttle or the Explorers?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Farewell, people. I'm leaving to meet my destiny.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: What’s wrong? You look awful.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_1
Reply.text: That's terrible! Who could have done this? No gang passed through Sowth. We would have noticed.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_2
Reply.text: Calm down! They had enough firepower to destroy whole village with its defenders, should you mess with an enemy like that?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_3
Reply.text: I don't disagree with you! I hate the raiders too! It's just how are you gonna find these killers if no one's even seen them?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_4
Reply.text: Felix is a dangerous man. You don't seem to care, however... Well, he resides in a small well-defended village. A bandit's base, one can say.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_5
Reply.text: Actually, we had a truce of a kind with him... We pay him and he does not harm our villagers.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_6
Reply.text: But now you are going to attack their lair! Well, I also want to get rid of this Felix, so I will help you! You gonna need a better weapon. Go to Troitsk and talk to the barman. He owes me something.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Glukhoe is burnt down! Everybody is dead... my father...

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: They came another way then! I must find them and avenge my father!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_2
Reply.text: Think twice before before you say something like that again! That's my father! And dozens of innocent people! The murderers will be punished whatever the cost!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_3
Reply.text: Come to think of it, I have a feeling that Felix can be involved. Do you know where I could find him?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_4
Reply.text: Then it's gotta be him! Gathered his men and...

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_5
Reply.text: Don't you understand, the truce is broken! I have already met him on the battlefield and won. This time I will kill him!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_6
Reply.text: Thanks a lot!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Well, any good news?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_1
Reply.text: And for that please accept our immense gratitude. Here, take this: I have just collected this money to pay the next bandit's dues. You can also keep my weapon. Hope it will serve you better than me. I wish you good luck on your long and dangerous journey.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1
Reply.text: Felix won't trouble you anymore. I got rid of him.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: Farewell, good man. I don't know if I will ever come back, but I will remember your kindness.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Howdy, young man! Do you have a minute?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I see you're a badass driver, you've been all over the area, right? I might need some help with a cargo delivery as I don't know the region very well. Why don't you help and take me to some of the surrounding villages?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: You don't need to worry about the cargo. It's a no-brainer, and I'll pay you well.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: What are you thinking so hard about? Are you in?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_4
Reply.text: How considerate of you! Okay, no offense. I'll find another sucker. Ciao.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Huh, are you talking to me?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: What's the cargo, though?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: [Speaking to himself] There's something fishy going on here. I don't think I should get involved with bandits at the beginning of my career, it's better to keep my good name if I can help it.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Why not? I will help you.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAACTIVE'); TakeQuest('d_Lisa_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r1_Yes_Lisa_History_01' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: With all due respect, I must decline. I don't do business with bandits!

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_5
Reply.text: I guess I gotta go, too.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAREMOVE'); TActivate('ZASADA_4'); AddHistory( 'r1_No_Lisa_History_02' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()
